title: Ok but needs improvement
review: The menu in the app does NOT have all the things available for order when you go to the actual store. For instance the BK STACKER , I can still order that at my local Burger King but I can NOT order it on the app . Which is a deciding factor . I‚Äôd rather go and get exactly what I want then use the app which also tend to be more expensive. The only good part about the app is no 3rd party fees and the free delivery Sunday and Monday , makes it worth buying on those days only .

title: Great App, but...
review: Hello, until today, this was a great, not to mention a very accessible application for anyone who is blind. I'm guessing that I logged in using Facebook, so when I logged out of the app, I tried to log back in to the a app using the Facebook option, but it wouldn't allow me to. It displayed that there was some kind of error. I deleted the Facebook App and the Burger King App. The issue wasn't resolved. Please fix this.

title: Very convenient app
review: My family likes their burgers customized and the app makes it easy to leave off or add items to your burger or sandwich. When you‚Äôre ordering for about 6 people it‚Äôs difficult to get what everyone wants. With the app you can customize your order at home and double check that the order is correct. It saves a lot of time and trouble ordering at the store.

title: Refunds if restaurant does not have item placed in mobile order
review: The app itself is good. If the restaurant receives your mobile order and accepts your payment, they should be prepared to give a refund or should not accept the mobile order if they are out of that item you ordered. The store tells you, ‚ÄúSorry I can‚Äôt do anything about that.‚Äù

title: Buggy, No Apple Pay, stick with McDonald‚Äôs
review:
I tried using the 1 cent whopper promo, and the app just doesn‚Äôt work. After activating my coupon and placing my order, I tapped the ‚Äúdrive‚Äù button in the app, and it took me to Apple maps. When I went back to the app, the coupon was inactivated, and my order was gone.

I went back to McDonald‚Äôs and tried again. This time, I made sure to keep the app open. When I got to the store, it couldn‚Äôt charge my card. I added in two more cards, and it just kept erorring. Then the manager refused to help at all. 

I went back to McDonald‚Äôs and just ordered using their app, their working coupons, and Apple Pay.

title: Burger King cannot give refunds.
review:
I accidentally ordered from the wrong store- the two locations had very similar road names, but my mistake nonetheless. Anyways, after i realized this i try to change the location and it wont let me. so, logically thinking, i try to atleast cancel it. You cant cancel it. so i send a email regarding my problem and they tell me they don‚Äôt have the power to give refunds‚Ä¶ any other app for a fast food chain allows you to get refunds, change locations, or even cancel orders. burger king needs to follow this trend. 

tl;dr: burger king wont give refunds b/c it doesn‚Äôt have the power to do so.

review: I would love to use the Burger King app, however where I live in Hawaii, the app is unusable. title: Delivery option needs tweaking!!!
review:
App is good, when it works properly. 

When choosing delivery, the app does not allow the restaurant to be chosen. My closest BK recently closed down. As a result, for the last three months I cannot order delivery any longer as it still defaults to that location. 

BK has lost a lot of my business recently, and probably all local business in my area, as a result (at least one $25+ order per week for the last three months!!!)

title: Great app, enjoy the savings!
review: Burger King has a great app, I get great deals on Whoppers all the time. Also, have been appreciating it more within the past 6 months since this app always works without issues, unlike McDonalds app. McDonald‚Äôs app never lets me login and I stopped going there completely because there are no deals and Burger King has won my business. Thank you.

title: Needs Apple Pay
review: The app is decent but there‚Äôs no option for Apple or Google Pay. You have to enter CC information to complete your order. This is an inconvenience when you‚Äôre driving. With having the option of Apple Pay or Google Pay this would streamline the checkout process. Other chains offer this option and it‚Äôs seamless. Please update and get current like others.

title: Almost perfect
review:
I use the BK app cuz it‚Äôs cheaper than other food delivery apps. This would be five stars if it wasn‚Äôt for one very important feature you‚Äôve left out of the app. 

I WANT TO BE ABLE TO ADD SAUCES TO MY ORDER

I can‚Äôt eat onion rings without zesty sauce and I need like three or four of them. I‚Äôm lucky IF the employee remembers to even add the zesty sauce at all! And what if I want other sauces for my fries and stuff? It doesn‚Äôt even prompt you to add a sauce while you add the fries. WE NEED OUR SAUCES

title: Not enough options in the menu
review: The app menu is fairly easy to use but on certain items you cannot alter the toppings on the sandwiches or there is missing items. Example is the $3 2 bacon cheeseburger meal. If a person doesn‚Äôt want cheeseburgers you can‚Äôt take the cheese off and make them hamburgers and there is no hamburgers on the menu. They advertise as ‚ÄúHave It Your Way‚Äù when you can‚Äôt have it your way and can only have it the way the corporation wants you to have it. Burger King is the leader in false advertisement

title: UPDATE
review: Ok, well I left a nasty review last time (because the place where I was didn't participate in the 1¬¢ whopper promo) and I really was going to take it out on the local crew in the receipt survey BUT the app started working and I didn't have to take that route. title: App gets hung up on payment
review: My wife ordered first on her phone and the app got hung up on the payment screen when using Apple Pay. The app kicked her out. Started the same order again and submitted order, again using Apple Pay. Clicked the ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù button and it said something went wrong and my order was refunded. So I decided to order on my phone and the exact same thing happened. After four attempts the order finally went through. Seriously, everything app driven to make it easier and quicker. This experience anything but that.
developerResponse: {'id': 16657886, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/contact-support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2020-07-16T00:59:16Z'}

title: Charged for a cancelled order
review: A few nights ago I tried to place an order for my family. Due to COVID-19 there is a promotion for 2 free kids meals when you use the app to order. Not only did my order not appear to go through on the app, but I got an email saying my order was cancelled. I tried to call, but no luck getting through. I finally gave up and went to a competitor. Two days later (today) I check my bank statements and I was charged TWICE for the order. The store is working on rectifying the situation, but it also seems unfair that the local franchise owner has to be financially responsible for a problem the app caused.
developerResponse: {'id': 14494984, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/contact-support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2020-04-06T16:26:50Z'}

title: No way to cancel order once made
review: This is my first time ever writing a review and I‚Äôm 30 years old, but this was a necessity. My advice is if you make any kind of order purchase using this app right here please please pick up your order or have someone else pick it up. I say this because there is no kind of return policy what so ever which means your money will be gone down the drain if not. I‚Äôm not going to bore you with my long drawn out story but just know I would not be writing this here without any first hand experience I‚Äôll tell you that much! Good luck with this and as for me, I‚Äôm sticking with my McDonald‚Äôs app and this bk app can go in the garbage!

title: Frustrating to use
review:
The deals often still make food items expensive. The app is very slow. You also cannot cancel an order if you made a mistake in the ordering process or get a refund.

I was ordering at my default Burger King like I have done many times before, and all of a sudden my store no longer supported mobile orders, and it defaulted to the nearest Burger King which was half an hour away. I didn‚Äôt even realize this and I was still charged for it and could not cancel the order.
developerResponse: {'id': 29561821, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2022-05-04T23:49:54Z'}

title: Charged but no order went through!!
review: I put my order through on the app and it charged me but never went to the restaurant.  I made sure I was at the correct location and  I went inside to try to fix the issue. The guy had me put it through again while he watched.  The same thing happened again so now I‚Äôve paid twice and have no food. Then he puts my order in at the counter and charges me a THIRD TIME and said there is nothing he can do and I have to call customer service to get the money back. Not the first time this app has done this to me
developerResponse: {'id': 28461194, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2022-03-09T05:12:13Z'}

title: Very useful
review:
I order 2-3 times a month. I like being able to customize each burger or sandwich toppings and condiments. Payment with Apple Pay or other credit card is very easy. 
Not many Burger King locations in my area accept orders online or through this app. That‚Äôs a decision of each franchise and nothing can be held against the app or Burger King.
Enjoy!

title: Doesn‚Äôt Work
review: Spent over 30 minutes trying to place an order and was lead in circles around the app the entire time. App kept prompting me to check availability instead of start an order, despite selecting having a store selected. Even after following these instructions i was lead BACK to the deals page instead of the food I wanted to order, the menu, store selection, or any other sane and logical option. If the store doesn‚Äôt take mobile orders, there should be a statement saying so. Extremely frustrated and disappointed in an app that can‚Äôt do the basics.
developerResponse: {'id': 25011567, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2021-09-09T22:49:16Z'}

title: Drive Thru & Condiments
review:
I ordered to pick up inside and the door was locked
So I then had to sit in line for Drive Thru. Defeats the purpose of ordering ahead. If the dining room isn‚Äôt open for seating that is understandable however the inside pick up feature should be turned off. I wasted more than 10 minutes sitting in line for my order. 
There is also not a way to order condiments such as the onion ring sauce through the app which slows down the pick up process

title: Charges your bank before it records the transaction
review: So I tried to order delivery a few days ago. Got to the final screen and the app froze. Closed out the app and went back in. No order recorded in app but my bank had a pending charge. I assumed wrongly that the pending charge would drop. So I tried again. And again another pending charge, and the app froze again. And again no record of the order so when I contact support they say it didn't happen. Now my bank has gone from pending to paid on those charges so I'm out $44 with no food and a pain in the rear to fix.
developerResponse: {'id': 23806930, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2021-07-07T22:36:14Z'}

title: Find a new store error - delivery option
review: I had to submit my order several times, after each time I had to select a new store my cart order would disappear, forcing me to re-enter it. I would have trouble with adding some selections, while having older (2 for $6) offers were available for re-order. Finally, after I figured out not to take the older offer or the special offer at checkouts, by selecting the back option I could get the app to work better. Bugs after a fresh update, good thing I‚Äôm hungry and it‚Äôs too hot outside to go get it myself.
developerResponse: {'id': 23189098, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2021-06-04T06:54:13Z'}

title: Great
review: Great time saver and awesome app. The only time it can a bit of a pain is sometimes the system can be glitchy causing issues with getting order through. Seems to only be when either bad weather happens or after not being notified about possible system updates. Other than that it‚Äôs awesome.

title: A Step from Tradition
review: I'm glad that BK has made a mobile app and continued evolving their services from being just a restaurant after all these years. Having customer loyalty programs and an order ahead service through the website or this mobile app has really saved the troubles of waiting in line so long.

title: Disappointed
review: The Burger King at Town Square Shopping Center, Cullman Al. needs to clean up a little. I went through at 8 am this morning and there was trash all outside on the ground at the drive through window.  Looked like it had been there a couple of days and the windows of the drive through are so dirty you can‚Äôt see through them well.  I went there to get a bacon croissant, just bacon and I got 1 piece broken in half for $2.71!  This was not acceptable to me. If you can‚Äôt do better than that please let me know and I won‚Äôt be back.
developerResponse: {'id': 19703539, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/contact-support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2020-12-11T18:30:42Z'}

title: Disappointing
review:
I just want to order food, receive it, and enjoy it.  I don‚Äôt know why ordering has to be so complicated! Certain combinations of orders just aren‚Äôt allowed.  There is no way to change items already in the cart.  There is no way to order without creating an account. 
When the food finally arrived, items were missing.  But there is no way in the app to report any kind of problem with the order. 
Also, if you want to use a coupon, you can‚Äôt use the app. 
Next time I want BK, I will skip the app and just go get it myself.

title: Oops, something went wrong
review:
Guys,

Please see my review title: this is what I see every time I attempt to place an order. It shouldn‚Äôt be that hard to build an app that processes orders. This is a basic function and you should want your bottom line to grow as easy and reliable is what‚Äôs user friendly. The only time this app worked is when I redeemed the winter wonderland promos. Not sure if the app isn‚Äôt well supported in certain areas but I have never been able to process an order since then. It will NEVER work. Please try to fix.. I love BK but the app needs work so I‚Äôll stick to the number coupon codes in the meantime.

Thank you

title: App hasn‚Äôt been able to process payment since July
review: The app was great for about the first 6 months of 2019. Previous to that it froze and required reloading so often it wasn‚Äôt worth while. Then it started working great and I used it at least once a week without any problems. Mid July 2019 I updated the app and have never been able to submit a mobile order again! Every time I get an error saying it can‚Äôt process my payment. I‚Äôve tried adding different cards, never works. It‚Äôs been months and I have deleted the app and all payment forms many times. Only thing the app is good for is coupons now.

title: Not convenient for mobile orders
review: Tried this for the first time today. Mobile orders force you to go inside to pick up (at least the location I was at). The order wasn‚Äôt confirmed until I checked in. Waited around for them to make it. The soda machine was also out of most flavors as well, people taking forever to choose what little was available.  Staff was very nice and did there best. 13 min from walking in to walking out the door for a to go order.  Traditional drive though would‚Äôve been 5 min. If this is intended to add convenience, it doesn‚Äôt in its current form.

title: Excellent deals, somewhat laggy app
review:
There are some absolutely amazing deals available in the app, especially for groups, and you can usually get a whopper combo for cheaper than menu price every day but the app chugs and requires restarting sometimes mid order. 

It does save your order between crashes/restarts, but it‚Äôs still annoying, especially with how slowly it loads the menu initially.

title: No complaints
review: I think of using the BK app every time I pull up to a drive through and they take forever to answer. I always go to the offers and start my mobile order like that so ultimately even though there is slow service at most drive throughs I appreciate the amount of money I save. 10/10 recommend

title: Not very user friendly‚Ä¶
review: The app doesn‚Äôt give you anyplace to ask for condiments. You order fries? No ketchup. You order onion rings? No zesty sauce. Only if you order their chicken nuggets can you get a sauce pack. And only the amount they think you need. Other restaurants let you order condiments on the side and however many you‚Äôd like. Also said I would get delivery for $1 if I used the app, still got charged $3 to use it. It also made me press the order button several times to order my food. I‚Äôm hoping I wasn‚Äôt overcharged.
developerResponse: {'id': 23959170, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2021-07-16T06:54:24Z'}

title: This app isn‚Äôt that great
review: Well I can order remotely so that‚Äôs why it‚Äôs not one star.  Everything about this app otherwise is terrible!  Where to start?  Apple Pay doesn‚Äôt work with it.  You cannot remove items like Mayo only make it lite.  What happened to Whoppers your way?  Wow.  Also half the menu of the actual store is missing.  Lastly can you say it‚Äôs the slowest running app I‚Äôve ever encountered?  They should trash this and hire a real company to develop a better version of their app.  Once again Burger King is behind the curve!
developerResponse: {'id': 22319372, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2021-04-19T08:51:43Z'}

title: Best idea ever!!
review: I was SOOO impressed with the quality of my food and the speed of service I got in the drive thru ordering with the app! What an amazing idea!! To let me place my own order on the app, pull up to the drive-thru (any time I wanted), give my order number and pull forward to hot and delicious food made to order!! It saved so much time and helped ensure accuracy of my order!! If there was a mistake, it was on me. Love it!!

title: Needs Work
review:
EDIT: The customer service is absolutely SUPERB. The issue was corrected quickly and I was refunded the money. But can we PLEASE get an option to add a gift card to the app?  This would be amazing!

Ordered from this 3-4 times before and never had an issue other than it being slow or randomly closing out. That i can deal with. Today i was double charged for an order, currently waiting for it to be refunded. Otherwise the deals are pretty sweet.

title: Don‚Äôt use the app to order
review: Don‚Äôt use the app, at the time that you make the order through the app, when you go to pick up, they tell you that half of your order could not be completely because, they out of everything. Today I made a order using the app and when I got to the window the employee told me that they didn‚Äôt have salads, shakes and another drink that I had ordered, he told me he couldn‚Äôt give a refund, I said if it could be replaced for an equal value and he didn‚Äôt want to , too much trouble on him . So I was short food and met with attitude. -5 stars

title: Basically a useless app
review:
Using Apple Pay never works. Placing an order works about 25-30% of the time and contacting support basically ends with ‚Äúplease delete and install app again‚Äù. Which, of course, I‚Äôm happy to do to help out but after having done that each time it stops working it gets old. Now, if you actually have to continuously reinstall an app it wasn‚Äôt very well developed to start with.  

Outside of that, Burger King still don‚Äôt have this mobile app process figured out. Each location seem to have their own process and some seem to be a guessing game. But this is for rating the app and app only.

title: First time using BK app mobile order
review: The procedure run smoothly except,when my order come up the lady who work at the cashier skip my order number #84 until it up to #94 and I saw my order finished I notice the sticker of unlocking secret deal other than that everything fine my coffee nicely prepared, whopper is great and the nugget is excellent thanks for all introducing the mobile order in the app its great app

title: Worst App!
review:
Their app is the absolute worst! Impossible to sign in. Impossible to sign up. Impossible to contact them. None of their features work! Constantly gives me an error message and this has been happening since the beginning of this pandemic. 

While other establishments have improved their online ordering system to cater to the needs of this pandemic, BK has not. If they can‚Äôt bother to fix their technical issues, then I‚Äôll patron other restaurants. 

It is simply not worth spending 10 minutes to get this app to work when you could just order from Doordash. Waste of time! Deleting the app now.
developerResponse: {'id': 15436165, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/contact-support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2020-05-20T07:06:12Z'}

title: Glitchy at best
review: Ordering through the app goes OK, but come to pay and I get an unhelpful message ‚ÄúOops, looks like something went wrong. We won‚Äôt be able to complete this transaction. Check with your card provider for details.‚Äù  How am I supposed to check with my card provider about something that doesn‚Äôt happen?  This happens with both Apple Pay and my regular bank card.  Both accounts are current and work fine for purchases everywhere else. Has happened both times I tried this app about ten days apart. You need to fix.

title: Lack of Flexibility
review: When ordering meals or deals there are a lot of limitations. On meals, if you pick a size, the side item and drink HAS to stay that size. You can‚Äôt change maybe just the drink to be large. Yes, of course, I‚Äôll pay the added difference between the sizes. But if thirsty for more, I have to order a 2nd drink. And then there are limits on drink choices. What if I wanted an frozen coke instead of a regular one? Should be able to pay the difference there too. BK, what happened to the days of ‚ÄòMake it Your Way‚Äô?

title: Faulty ordering issue
review: App displays that the order failed to go through and they are aware of the situation. In reality the order did go through but the app doesn‚Äôt relay it the consumer. I then purchase the same thing, this time successfully. I go in to pick my order up to find out it did in fact order 2. Instead of being able to cancel one for a refund the staff let me know they have no power over the app and I would have to call in. Called in but hung up after a 10 minute wait. Deleted the app and won‚Äôt make this mistake again.

title: Absolutely Awful
review: The manager asked me if I‚Äôd like to download and try the app. I agreed. While on their WiFi, she told me the name of the street we were on so I placed an order. After awhile, I asked where my food was and she said they never received it. I showed her my phone and she said the order went to the other BK on the same road. So I called that BK to cancel my order and the Manager told me they never received my order either. Frustrated and hungry , I just paid for my food. The next day I was charged for the app order by my bank. I‚Äôve been going back and forth for over a month now wit no resolution. I‚Äôll never use this app again!

title: Burger King is AWESOME
review: Thank you SOOOOOOOO much for the BK app!!!! It seriously comes in handy for this family on an extremely tight budget! Also- the quality of the food is great! We used to say another certain restaurant had the best fries! Wellllllll.......NOT ANYMORE!!!! The crew at your Pickens SC is the best btw! They‚Äôre always so nice & know what we want! That also in itself is the best reason to go there to eat! You just can‚Äôt hardly find that anywhere anymore üòçüòçüòç

title: App is super SLOW! almost useless compared to other fast food
review: I use all the fast food Resturant apps and the only one I have issues with is the Burger King app. It never loads. Over and over, I am stuck waiting over 2-5 minutes waiting for the app to load. I do not have that problem with any of the other fast food Resturant. I can pull up to McDonald‚Äôs, find what I want in the app, view my rewards and order. Burger King, over and over, I regret using the app. It is just stuck on a white sceeen and doesn‚Äôt load.

title: Would be a good app if the location received the customizations
review: Used the app to order in advance. Took 5 minutes to drive there. When I arrived I was second in the drive thru. Sat and waited behind this one car for 7 minutes. When I got home we discovered all the whoppers were the same; one was supposed to have cheese, another was supposed to be an Impossible Whopper. App saved no time and the customization it offered was either not communicated to the restaurant or was ignored by the staff. It have been just as fast and more reliable to order in person.
developerResponse: {'id': 25711782, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2021-10-16T06:22:33Z'}

title: Nearly unusable app
review: I can‚Äôt order, view the menu, activate coupons, or use my rewards. It just keeps refreshing the page as soon as anything is on it when on the checkout screen, and will randomly crash on any other screen. It‚Äôs also draining my battery (went from 100% to 93% in two minutes, while plugged in; how does that even happen?!) and making my phone incredibly hot. Using latest iOS, on WiFi, and even took off WiFi to see if the problems persist on cell data (they do). Would love to use it, but I just can‚Äôt.

title: Great app but‚Ä¶..
review:
When the app says ‚ÄúWe are checking with the location‚Äù after you place your order, you really need to check with the location.
Several times I‚Äôve ordered milk shakes only to drive up and be told their machine was down. Once I went to get my order and they were closed! They said the registers weren‚Äôt working. What exactly are you ‚Äúchecking‚Äù with the store?

title: App needs help
review: It it‚Äôs pretty awesome you guys do this, one thing I would fix is having more delivery staff available maybe people already on the clock, that way they can stay clocked in deliver and make tips. Bc the app will drop and then we have to start order over. But so we don‚Äôt have to start our orders over again maybe the app can save the order info. Bc it gets frustrating lol but very cool

title: Terrible
review: I‚Äôm upset because I ordered for the first time using my T Mobile Tuesday coupon to receive a free whopper and small fries with a $1 purchase I ordered a shake and the app charged my card I went to the Burger King that I ordered via the store locator on the app and they did not have my order I pressed the I am here and everything but nothing populated in their system and my order numbers were skipped in the system. I talked with the manager and nothing could be done I would have to be charged again. It was an upsetting thing and I don‚Äôt believe that I will be using this app again

title: Changes order
review: Whenever I customize my order it gets changed to something else. You won‚Äôt know the app changed it until it gets delivered and you look at the receipt on the bag. title: Keeps rejecting my order after confirmation
review:
So the app does this thing where every time I confirm my order, it gives me an error and tells me to update my card information. What‚Äôs really crazy though is that it charges my card every time I press confirm order.

It‚Äôs really upsetting because the app has so many good deals, and it gave me a reason to go to burger king every day last summer but now I can‚Äôt even use it. Very disappointing and I hope they actually try to fix this in the future. I will probably change my review in the future if I ever feel the need to try and order from the app again.

title: Please fix!!!
review: For two weeks now BK has lost my business because the app isn‚Äôt loading. I miss the 59cent cheeseburger coupon it offers and the ability to customize toppings without having to ask in person. (Suggestion: being able to say no ice on the drinks would be awesome!) The last 2 times I‚Äôve attempted to mobile order it continuously has the loading dots. Both phone and app are up to date and it looks like I‚Äôm not the only one experiencing this problem.

title: Wish I could just look at the menu during off hours
review: I‚Äôm really happy with the way the digital coupons work.  My only quibble is not being able to view the menu when my local store is closed.  I work weird hours and sometimes like to plan ahead what I‚Äôm going to pick up when I get off of work.  Right now, the app only lets you look at the menu if you‚Äôre ready to place an order, which means it won‚Äôt work at all if your BK is closed.  Hope they change this.

title: Nice app that functions well
review: I am so happy to use this app. It works well on my older iPhone. Big thank you to the developers for not shunning older iOS (McDonalds will not include older mobile OS in their updates and their response is to purchase the latest greatest phone). I can see the menu and make purchases without any problems.

title: App literally prevents orders from being received by Burger King
review: It sounded like a great idea and so did the coupons. I downloaded the app while in the BK parking lot, connected my card, placed my order and was charged. When I went to the pickup window the only thing the employees could see on their screen was my order number and total payment. For the next 15 minutes the drive through line was halted while I placed my order at the window again and waited for the kind- but - frazzled staff to prepare the items and try to make their screen register something. Old- school drive through worked. Too bad about the app.

title: Good deals, bad app
review: I used to constantly use the deals, when they would work for me. I‚Äôve never been able to mobile order, it makes me chose a location even though I‚Äôve already chosen it. Then when I do choose it again it just takes me back to step one. Before this too, the app would take forever to even load up when I would go to the restaurants, so I wouldn‚Äôt even get to use any of the deals. I haven‚Äôt been able to successfully use this app for months.
developerResponse: {'id': 26654384, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2021-12-06T01:04:57Z'}

title: Save $$ Easily With This App
review: I like this app because in any city I can pull up coupons for that location and also I no longer have to carry the paper coupons around anymore. At the drop of a hat, if I‚Äôm out, I can just pull up the app and use the coupons. It‚Äôs so much easier and the coupons are always really great deals.
userName: One of the first Pandora Users

title: Buggy App possible due to‚Ä¶
review: The app has been buggy lately which could be tied to determining if the stores are open/closed due to staffing issues.  Although the app shows the store is open, when you attempt to place an order and pay, the app doesn‚Äôt process the payment or provide an immediate refund.  After attempting this at another location and failing, now I cannot use an offer on my app for another 60 minutes.  At this point, I rather not use BK until they can update the app to identify prior to ordering if a store is temporarily closed.

title: So incredibly laggy.
review: I really do not like this app‚Ä¶ I didn‚Äôt have ad my cash or cards on my, and was trying to order food in the parking lot via the app. It kept crashing, or freezing, and just not working. I screwed around with it long enough that I realized in the time I wasted trying to get the app to work, I could have driven home, grabbed cash, and drive on by some Golden Arches instead of waiting for a buggy, laggy, inefficient app. So that‚Äôs what I did. Just for laughs, I compared both times, and I saved about 12 minutes using the second method as apposed to this app.

title: Doesn‚Äôt provide you with the best offers
review: The app doesn‚Äôt always provide you with the best offers available. For example. I placed an order for two Whoppers with the app. Only to find that there was a buy one get one for a dollar offer available on the menu when I picked my order up. That particular offer was not listed on the app. BK really should give access to all the best offers with the app. Or, what‚Äôs the point in using it?

title: Delivery time
review: The app is great just one little issue., you won‚Äôt know how long it will be until AFTER you pay for the order.. so at that point you can even decide if you want to wait or pass no choice. Some people just don‚Äôt have the time to be waiting around I live 3 minutes away walking and gotta wait 1 hr for delivery

title: A life raft on a stranded island.
review: I‚Äôm jobless and homeless currently which makes finding food on a daily basis a little difficult. Taking a chance on this app was the best thing that could have happened to me though. Between the coupon and promotional offers, I‚Äôm able to get food on a daily basis. Thank you Burger King and your affiliates, from the very bottom of my heart, for supporting the less fortunate.

title: It‚Äôs really nice
review: It‚Äôs better then ordering crystals they sent me old stale food and not what I ordered on purpose they apparently had attitudes with the DoorDash driver so there‚Äôs 20 bucks wasted but Burger King has there own ordering system so you actually get your food only thing is the food be cold like the driver be going places before they get to you and dude was on the phone but I can let that go lol it‚Äôs just my baby be waiting to eat! And I like good customer service!

title: Login is flawed
review: It would be much easier to login with a password instead of having to go to your email every time you want to login. I had my mother-in-law with my family on a trip & she wanted to use her login to get her coupon on my phone‚Äôs app (she‚Äôs older, doesn‚Äôt deal with apps) & The app wanted to go to her email, which isn‚Äôt on my phone. We used to have passwords for the account. It was more convenient. Other than that, it‚Äôs a good app. Works fine if your email is readily available.

title: Lost order
review: I placed an order for the first (& now last) time today. As you may know, they use door dash for delivery. Well, my dasher text me advising that the restaurant did not have my order. How is that? I called the restaurant and no answer. I kept checking my order on the app , my dasher changed twice then said it was delivered. I went to the restaurant myself and they confirmed they don‚Äôt have my order and I was told they couldn‚Äôt do anything for me. Obviously the app has an issue with sending orders to the restaurants, but they make sure to take your money. Don‚Äôt recommend using the app. Go through door dash directly.

title: This app is horrible!!
review: I find it shocking to believe that a multi millionaire fast food chain that is one of the leading household names when it comes to fast food does not have the funds to hire experts that would develop an OK or even mediocre app! Every single time I open the app it has to do some sort of update. I can open the app right now, Close it and go back to it within a minute and it will still say I need to do an update. A few times I placed an order and when I get to the restaurant they never have my order. What is the point of even having an app if your consumers are not even able to use it!!!

title: App does not open
review:
I liked the old version. This new one won‚Äôt open at all past the ‚Äúyou need to update your app‚Äù message. I follow the prompt that goes nowhere. Couldn‚Äôt even use the app at the restaurant last night...and the cashier was not helpful at all.
We didn‚Äôt push the issue at all, ordered anyway, and seemed to be a bother to her for even showing up there for dinner. ‚òπÔ∏è

title: Overall really good
review: Not sure why I can‚Äôt select ketchup as a sauce though. Lots of other choices but you can‚Äôt ask for the most common one? Weird. I get not having a separate option just for ordering sauce a la carts to save money, but not being able to choose ketchup means I have to ask in the drive through every time.

title: The edit of orders
review: I have fallen for this 2 times. I edit a sandwich and put it into the shopping cart. Order other items and realize I missed something on my sandwich. So while it‚Äôs in the shopping cart I hit edit to add the item I forgot and I don‚Äôt realize that it strips away all your edits from before. So I pickup my meal and leave only to find out I have the extra sauce but all items on the 1st edit are removed! That is DUMB!!!  Why would you remove my 1st edits? Never asked you too remove previous edits! At least other fast food chains DON‚ÄôT do that! Hint, your computation!

This Burger King app is simple to use, I can order and have someone else pick up for me

title: Great deals, but ...
review:
The app offers some great deals, but it has several technical problems, including claiming products are available that are not, and allowing only credit cards or Apple Pay, not gift cards or cash to be used as payment for mobile orders. 

As long as you‚Äôre able to work around the bugs, you will find great deals and rewards. But it can be truly frustrating to use some days.

title: Does what it needs to.
review:
I like this app, clear, tidy, functional. Everything is visible that I may need. The mobile order deals are of a good variety. 

Only thing I would add is a condiment menu. I can never remember who carries which sauces I like, and I would rather have them in the bag waiting for me, than to hold up the line while the poor guy at the window has to rummage for an awkward handful because I forgot.

title: Glitchy!
review:
Sometimes the deals walk you through the order, but most of the time they just go into the ether and you cannot see them until you add something else to your cart, but then you cannot do anything with it except remove it.

The constant ‚Äúchecking with your store‚Äù is also very annoying. I think my store must have dialup because I spend more time watching a burger flip then benefiting from the use of the app.

In the end, I give up and order form somewhere else...

title: Inconsistent

title: App that will get your order
review: The app doesn‚Äôt work well. Pricing doesn‚Äôt add properly (your sub total is more than the sum of your items) fee for using app? it doesn‚Äôt function properly. Login options they give don‚Äôt work. Gives option for food they no longer have so when you do show up they have to rework the order when you get there. Overall it seems like someone made their first app and it happened to be for a very large corporation. Not sure why they decided to hire a noob for the app design and completely scrap the testing phase.

title: Mobile ordering update
review: The app was working just fine before it was updated. Now I can‚Äôt even look at the menu before I select a Burger King location and if the location near me does not have mobile ordering then I‚Äôm unable to look at the menu. People need the option to mobile order if it‚Äôs available in their area but they also need the option to just look at the menu. I keep downloading this app in hopes that it‚Äôs changed but that‚Äôs still not the case. I don‚Äôt have these issues with the McDonald app and that‚Äôs why they‚Äôll keep getting my money until you fix your app!

title: Website may work better than app.
review: App UI is slow and unresponsive. Deals banners are outdated, advertising a $5 product that links to the order page for $6. No way to remove payment methods from account. App crashed several times when trying to remove items from my cart. ‚ÄúPlace secure order‚Äù button loads, and then returns to previous state. For context, the device we used is relatively new and uses iOS 16.1. I‚Äôm all for coming out with rewards apps to encourage customers to choose your business, and hope this feedback helps.

title: App not loading in drive thru only
review: I love the app and it has great deal. I am giving it 3 stars because the app seems to never load when I am at a Burger King store. If I try to open the app when I am in the drive thru it does not load. This has happened 5 times at multiple stores. I never have a problem opening the app when not near a store. I think this is on purpose to discourage the use of mobile coupons in person.

title: Extremely frustrating ordering system
review: The app does not tell you if an item is not available when ordering, but if something in your order is not available at a particular location it simply says the restaurant can‚Äôt be contacted, and it won‚Äôt even let you access your cart to remove a suspected offending item, you have to start the whole order over. title: Just....no.

Anyway, they couldn‚Äôt transfer the order to my nearest location or refund my money at the restaurant the order was sent to. I cannot drive to that location because I‚Äôm on my lunch break and it‚Äôs pretty far. I have to wait for someone from the app to send me an email to get my money back. App deleted. I want my money!

title: What‚Äôs the point in mobile ordering?
review: What‚Äôs the point of mobile ordering if it takes LONGER than just going through the drive thru regularly. I had to pull off so that people behind me could get their food. I only get a 30min lunch for work and I felt the mobile ordering would be quicker than just going through the drive thru. It‚Äôs isn‚Äôt quicker and if I would have just gone through the drive thru I would have gotten my food faster. What‚Äôs the point in mobile ordering?

title: Need additional ordering features
review:
The problem with ordering on this app is it does not let you order extra items such as extra pickles, onions, tomatoes or lettuce.  

In addition, it doesn‚Äôt allow me to order my French fries or burger without salt. 

If you look at the McDonald‚Äôs app, when you order and customize your hamburger or any item, it list all of the items on the product you are ordering including salt and allows you to add extra items or completely eliminate them like salt.

title: The worst app
review: They offer the best coupons for mobile orders only.  I have a lot of BK‚Äôs in my area but no convenient location accepts mobile orders.  Corporate says it‚Äôs up to each location whether they want to set up mobile ordering.  I live within 10 miles of 10 BKs and none of them accept it.  The fact the company offers their best coupons to a subset of their customers based on if they are lucky to live close to one of these locations is ridiculous.  They never return calls and clearly either don‚Äôt care about their customers or have a corporate staff that all need to be fired.

title: Blank Screen
review:
Problem with the app. Upon attempting to log on, get a white blank screen.
App has been working well and has credit card information listed as a paying method. Now I get nothing on the screen and am wondering if you have been hacked and my card info is floating somewhere in cyber space.

title: Waste of time
review: Don‚Äôt bother ordering ahead to try and save time. They don‚Äôt add you to the queue until you show up, and then they prioritize all of the other orders ahead of yours.I got the app and ordered ahead because I had limited time- I ended up missing my event because they processed people who arrived after me before I got my food 25 minutes later. (I ordered a half hour ahead thinking they‚Äôd have it ready).What is even the purpose of ordering ahead if it doesn‚Äôt save you any time at all? title: Does work properly
review: The updates were a great idea, but obviously someone was in a huge hurry to gets these updates finished because they don‚Äôt work properly. If click on an offer that has 2 sandwiches forget about trying to customize them. If you want both sandwiches to be the same (i.e. extra onion no ketchup.) you customize the first one then go to the second one and customize it, it will remove the changes on the first one. So I went back up re-entered my preferences and yep you guessed it. It removed the changes on the second sandwich. There is no way to have both sandwiches the same.

title: Horrible experience
review: Used for the first time because of the T-Mobile  Free Impossible burger offer. There was no instructions saying to wait to redeem at the store so of course when I got there I was told that I  couldn‚Äôt use my coupon. I am the only vegetarian in my house so o know that one else used my coupon. Fine I said I will‚Äô just pay for my  whopper and placed an order for my entire family. Ended been charged for an extra whopper and had to have someone credit me. Left frustrated but didn‚Äôt take it on anyone because life happens. Got home and realize that I left all my drinks there !!!üò°

title: App needs work!
review:
Has not been accurate and/or has not worked correctly more than it has worked correctly. Problems include:

- showing a location closed when it is open
- unable to order due to getting an error message that says ‚ÄúError retrieving item pricing‚Äù
- error message that says ‚Äúsomething went wrong, please try again later‚Äù
- inability to add a previous order to favorites
- when you click on the ‚Äúapp support‚Äù link in the Apple App Store, it takes you to the BK website and you get an error saying the page cannot be found. 

I‚Äôve got only been able to successfully order once and have tried multiple times to order. Trying to support BK because they have the Impossible burger option, but at this point I‚Äôll start looking elsewhere for meatless options (have a family member with a meat/food allergy issue, hence why we wanted to patronize BK for the impossible whopper).

title: Unable to make mobile order
review: Tried making a mobile order and it‚Äôs unable to retrieve the prices so I‚Äôm unable to make an order at my local Burger King. It worked fine last month when I made my first order, but I still waited at the counter for 20+ minutes for my order. I was the only one in the store and there was 2 cars that went through the drive through while I was there. There‚Äôs no reason that I had to sit there and wait over 20 minutes in order to get my food that I ordered and paid for.

title: Bk has jumped the shark!
review:
Your App and coupons are a joke! Took forever to download and sign up. Which I didn‚Äôt have the spare half day to do..... 
So I decide why not do that later and just go to the drive through and grab a whopper ‚ÄúJUNIOR‚Äù WITHOUT TOMATO....For a late lunch and could not even believe they had the nerve to look me straight in the face and ask for $2.69!!!!! This will be the Last time I swing by BK for an inexpensive JR SIZED burger!!!  MAJOR RIP OFF & actually an insult when you consider that you can buy a FULL sized whopper and get one free!!!!! 
Not brave enough to dare go in and question my order üò≥üëçüèª....so just chalking it up to life experience  ‚Äúnever again‚Äù   Good luck BK‚úåüèª

title: No way to order a simple Whopper with cheese
review: The app is mostly good, but there‚Äôs no way to order a whopper with cheese without it adding ‚ÄúNo cheese‚Äù or ‚ÄúNo American Cheese‚Äù in the order details. This doesn‚Äôt happen with the double whopper or any other burger, as far as I can tell. Been this way for at least a few months now, which is surprising as you‚Äôd think they would pay a little more attention to their most popular item!

title: Terrible App.

title: Misleading Coupons, Terrible Customer Service
review:
I had a terrible customer experience. There was a coupon offering an Impossible whopper for free. This coupon is from T-Mobile‚Äôs Tuesday‚Äôs offer. I submitted this coupon and was denied the sandwich because I didn‚Äôt order it on a Tuesday, despite the fact in the fine print saying I have 6 days to redeem.

I spoke to the manager and he ‚Äúclaims‚Äù he spoke with higher management saying to deny customers with the coupon who don‚Äôt come in on a Tuesday. Really? Disappointing. Terrible customer service. On top of that wasted my time downloading the Burger King app and signing up.

title: Great coupons
review: I really appreciate coupons being available from the BK app. The old way of keeping up with physical coupons can be a hassle especially when they get lost, torn, or wet. Whenever I don‚Äôt feel like cooking and just want a cheap deal I can always count on this app for some great coupons to feed myself and my lady for less than $10!

title: Congrats on Breaking the App
review:
The app worked remarkably fine until this late August update.

First I tried to order my usual from the deal selection: 2 Whopper Jr. + 2 small fries for $4. Now you can‚Äôt add cheese for an upcharge. Why?? What happened to ‚Äúhave it your way‚Äù? Such a simple and odd thing to remove all of a sudden. Makes no sense.

So then I opted to get a similar deal with 2 bacon cheeseburgers instead. ‚ÄúNot available at his location‚Äù it said... okay? Then why display it? Why not adjust the deals to the location? What year are we in? Why is this app increasingly inconvenient and causing more work just to order burgers and fries? 

Welp... Regardless of what you select, now the app for some reason says it can‚Äôt get the item pricing and you‚Äôre just sitting at the checkout waiting, unable to make your purchase... wow. Lol. Great work guys. 

I‚Äôm at a loss for how wildly dysfunctional the app is after an ‚Äúupdate‚Äù

Deleting. Lost a customer.

title: Poor customer service
review: Got a notification to get a whopper for .01 and I ordered it through the app. I get to the window and they tell me that they cannot make it because it‚Äôs 20 minutes before lunch, yet the app has me dive to McDonald‚Äôs to get the deal then drive back to Burger King. The app allowed me to place my order and even told me that they were preparing my food. I get to the window and was told I can‚Äôt get my meal. I explained the app situation and the manager told me to come back later. I explained to him that I was not from the area and was an hour and a half away from home. He told me there was nothing he could do.

title: Questionable 5 stars?!? You can even pick your soda.
review:
Try to order ‚Äòmix and match meals‚Äô but you couldn‚Äôt even select the sandwiches, so I opted to order a single meal instead. When I try to pick the type of soda by customizing your order, again that part of the app is unresponsive. What‚Äôs the point of having ‚Äúcustomize your order‚Äù section if it doesn‚Äôt even work. It‚Äôs frustrating to order from the app. Comparing BK app with other app from similar business (golden arches), this app seems outdated. 
Developer please fix this issue. Thanks.

title: Stole my money!!
review:
Wrong location came through on mobile app and I noticed it right after placing my order.  Called the restaurant to see if they could cancel it, nope they can‚Äôt. They accidentally put ketchup in when you ask for none and you get a free meal but you call the store and company 30 seconds after making a mistaken order to cancel and they steal your money.

title: Facebook login broken
review:
Facebook login used to work fine. Now it‚Äôs stuck in development mode. BK support is useless and despite getting reports for over 3 weeks now (over a week from me personally), nothing has been done. No acknowledgement there is a problem even. Can‚Äôt place mobile orders or use my coupons that I won in their contest.
So if you use Facebook, DO NOT LOG OUT or you will not be able to order or use coffee club subscription. At this rate, could be several weeks or months before they bother to do what should be an easy fix considering Facebook always worked before.

title: Mobile Ordering Doesn‚Äôt Work for Special Coupons
review: Every time I try to use a couple that is for ‚ÄúMobile Orders Only‚Äù, including the Whopper for $0.01, I always get a message that says the coupon is not available for use at that Burger King! I‚Äôve tried using these ‚ÄúMobile orders only‚Äù coupons at 5 different locations that offer mobile orders! I was excited to use mobile ordering for BK since I live half a block away from one but I guess I‚Äôll have to go an extra 4 miles for a fast food restaurant whose mobile ordering works.

title: Using app for mobile order
review: The app wouldn‚Äôt work for me. The drive thru crew member had to do it.  I had used the prior mobile app with no problem but this app is not user friendly.  I had added the item and tried to applied the offer but it wouldn‚Äôt zero out the free item.  Frustrating.  Thanks.

I even typed up my thoughts for a review a few weeks ago and never saw it show up, unlike my reviews for other apps‚Ä¶. 

Anyway, would love it if this review could show up so Burger King can copy/paste that limp response about being ‚Äòbummed.‚Äô That would be thrilling for me.

It is your loss people‚Ä¶ address it properly.

title: Allow ANY items to be removed in app.
review:
The app works as designed. I just wish they would allow you to change every item. I‚Äôm dating myself, but Burger King‚Äôs slogan used to be ‚Äúhave it your way.‚Äù

When on keto I like to order the whopper with no bun‚Ä¶can‚Äôt do that in the app so I‚Äôd end up wasting it (or miss out on the $1 whopper Wednesday deal). 

My wife likes her whopper without the meat. Not an option on the app. I applaud BK by making vegetarian options (that taste like meat), but she doesn‚Äôt like the taste of meat or the fake meat. 

Half the time when ordering at the store they ring up her no meat whopper correctly and we only get charged a fraction of the cost (it‚Äôs a bun with veggies and condiments it should cost $5). The other half of the time the ring it up regular and just tell the custom order to the cooks. Making this change would eliminate a lot of opportunity for error.

title: Good fast food app
review: I will say I am biased towards Burger King based off of the quality of the food alone. This app offers consistent daily coupons and is perfect for feeding a family of four. title: Works ok but limited functionality
review: This app is a great way to take advantage of special offers and order in advance. What it does not do is allow every customization - why must I order a whopper with light Mayo instead of no Mayo? - out know when a restaurant is out of an item or has equipment down. The app is especially useful during COVID but I will keep using after

title: Nothing wrong with the food or the store but the app needs help.
review: Would not let me order a fish sandwich unless it came without tartar sauce. I would cancel the order and start over But still the same thing. A while back I was with a friend who wanted a fish sandwich without tartar sauce in it and remembers that and it can‚Äôt get rid of it. Can you go when you select Apple Pay is automatically put it on my credit card instead.

title: Good app
review:
This app is good for ordering from BK. once the order is made it usually arrives quickly. 
However, it doesn‚Äôt allow coupons and even their own perks given on email. 
i. e. I was supposed to get a free small whopper meal because of problems on the app previously. Nope never happened. 
But straight up orders go well, usually. But I still run into annoying problems.

title: R.I.P. BK App (2021)
review: So as of March 2021- this app has no become worthless. No longer will you ever see the ‚Äòfree kids meal with $1 purchase‚Äô coupon (I guess BK says screw you to being a parent),, removed the $3 meal offer coupon (nugs, fries, burg, and drink) so now the only ‚Äòcoupons‚Äô require you to spend at minimum $4-5 to accrue a savings of less than $1-2... on the plus side- now when you spend $50 you now earn points so all that excess spending can get you a free $1 value fry!! Ridiculous.. peace out BK! Your food was only worth it for the value- now that that‚Äôs gone, so too are your sales.

title: Baffling decisions by Burger King
review:
In one of the stupidest decisions I‚Äôve ever seen a fast food company make, there is no way to simply see a menu of what the company offers food-wise via the app (or website) if the locations in your area do not accept online/mobile orders.

To say again: it is impossible for me to simply see what food Burger King sells with this app. I‚Äôm not talking about local deals, or coupons, or regional test market items‚ÄîI‚Äôm talking their basic menu.

I can easily see what food is current sold by fast food franchises halfway across the country from me, but not the Burger King three blocks over.

title: Ordering times
review: I should be able to order whatever I want at whichever time I choose. I work in the early morning and take my lunch around 9:45-10:00am. All that‚Äôs available to order on the app is breakfast but in store I can order whatever I choose. I‚Äôd like to be able to order what I want, when I want and have it ready to be picked up and enjoy for lunch.

title: Easy to use and better prices and deals than Uber eats!
review: Uber eats has become far too expensive. BK gives a ton of deals and has weekly 1 dollar whoppers, so for someone who can‚Äôt spend a lot, this is usually my first choice! Easy to navigate and the rewards system is great too. Everything is priced fairly IMO.

title: Frigid dining room
review: I entered 5708 McCorkle Avenue Charleston,WV this morning with my friend in tow, hoping to enjoy one of your delicious breakfasts and coffee.  Imagine my horror when I stepped inside to find the temperature on your thermostat set at 69 DEGREES!!!  It was so cold ai couldn‚Äôt even get out my complaint without m teeth chattering and chill bumps rising below my short pants above m knees!  Nobody apologized or offered to rase the temperature to a more reasonable level.  We went to the nearby IHOP and enjoyed a wonderful breakfast in a tolerable air conditioned temperature.  A woman near our booth said she left your BK, too, for the same reason I was telling my waitress.  I suggest you get your act together.

title: Beware of the ghost coupon
review:
There are a few coupons that say they are available when they really aren‚Äôt. I think it doesn‚Äôt remove coupons you used and they don‚Äôt renew them, the coupons just stay there. 

Also you can‚Äôt order mobile to every store it‚Äôs only the stores that they allow. So depending on where you live it won‚Äôt even let you order online.

TL:DR- There are coupons that can‚Äôt be redeemed. You can‚Äôt order to every BK store so be careful. The app is really only useful for finding out what‚Äôs at the store.

title: Needs a pickup option other than just the drive through
review: I walk by a Burger King every day and the app is great except that the only to go option is the drive through.  So I can order in the app but if I pick the one restaurant option it assumes I am staying to eat.  I would really love just being able to walk in and grab my to go order.

title: Staff attitude and a long wait at drive through window
review: The light wasn‚Äôt on in the drive thru menu. It was 8:30 pm and dark.   I politely ask what size nuggets they had and he seemed totally put out by the question,  I went to explain why I asked,  he didn‚Äôt respond.  Also, waiting In  Line it took 6-8 minutes for our order to be taken with 2 vehicles ahead and about 13 minutes total from order to food.

title: Every time
review: I don‚Äôt usually do this but today I feel that I had enough. I come to this BK often for lunch. And often I just don‚Äôt care about the constant wrong orders but this is almost every single time. I order one thing and they give me a different order. The reason I don‚Äôt complain at them it‚Äôs because I‚Äôm using the drive thru and normally for lunch I just have to be as quick as possible. Today it happened again and the ladies keep trying to make it seem like it was my mistake. I‚Äôm tired of it, not coming back ever.

title: (‡≤†_‡≤†)   Wish I could order a burger in the morning.
review:
You can‚Äôt order burgers before a certain time on the app. Only breakfast food. Problem is, you can‚Äôt on the app. You order things on the app to have it ready when you get somewhere, but since you can‚Äôt order a hamburger if anybody wants it, everybody‚Äôs forced to wait. Some people wanna have a hamburger at 8o‚Äôclock in the morning. Also you should be able to upgrade the size of the fries and drinks on family bundles.

Thanks.

title: False advertising
review:
We were arriving at Burger King one morning and my husband suggested we see if they have an app with special offers. We downloaded the app and saw some offers we wanted to use. Had to create an account and sign in. As soon as we logged in, the offers changed and the ones we wanted to use (along with several others) were gone.

Today at home we saw an offer we wanted to use. We were logged in. Drove the half mile to BK, and when we got there several offers were gone, including the one we went for. We left and went to Jack in the Box

title: Disappointed - No Value Menu
review: I personally don‚Äôt like that BK didn‚Äôt include the value menu.  You act like you‚Äôre trying to help during the covid-19 pandemic by offering ‚Äúfree delivery‚Äù but you don‚Äôt offer inexpensive options that will help people keep costs down.  All the normally low priced options that are usually around $1 at the physical locations are now either marked up far above the normal price or they don‚Äôt offer them.  Disappointing!  The app works OK.  Good user experience & interface.

title: Never again
review: Do not download this app at all. There is no support for it if something happens. There was a mistake in the app and I called customer service. They would not refund me my money nor would they compensate me for the money that was taken off my card with no service provided. They would not even call me to talk to me they sent me a horrible  cookie cutter email saying that they are happy I‚Äôm a customer and they are not going to give me a refund. Done with this company and this app is horrible. At least when I had an issue with the McDonald‚Äôs app they corrected my order in customer service.

title: Good Coupons Included
review: BK has the best app by far!  Pretty much every coupon you see in-print is on the app, plus many others.  Every time I use this app, I‚Äôm saving money, and ordering quickly without having to worry about my orders being missunderstood.  I only wish it knew when the Ice Cream machine is out.

title: Extra pickles!!??
review:
I love the ease of ordering on the app and being able to pay with Apple Pay, but as a pregnant woman that loves pickles, I am rather disappointed that I can‚Äôt request extra pickles and tomatoes on my whopper in the app. This option is not available in the customize option. 
Also, the options available for drinks are severely limited compared to if you just order through the drive-thru. 
Looking forward to having those options!!!

title: Over all it‚Äôs alright.
review:
This app has had problems. I‚Äôve ordered and the store decided to close early once. It wasn‚Äôt faster picking food up. On slow drive thru days it works as it should. Why aren‚Äôt all the soda options available in the app? It could use some work to say the least. 1 can‚Äôt whopper was the only reason i got it. 

I will not now nor will i ever want to sign up for your coffee subscription BK! Please stop giving me pop ups about it trying to get me to press the join button on accident. It was literally sitting in the main navigation spot the app uses. Don‚Äôt do us dirty like that BK.

title: Burger King App Review
review: I do like having this app. It allows me the option to skip waiting in the lines at the registers. My local BKs usually do not have a staff member assigned to cover front counter and is a only when I get the staff‚Äôs attention my order is taken. Two things that could make this BK app better is to allow customers to add extra of the toppings to the sandwiches like heavy ketchup to Cheeseburgers. The second is to have a survey option for mobile orders just like if the placed in the BK restaurant.

title: Doesn‚Äôt respect drive thought order using the app.
review: I just order a large fries in the app as drive through, again only large fries. It was 5 min wait in the drive through and then they tell me I‚Äôve to come inside because order is not ready . And it‚Äôs only large Fries, nothing else . I have two kids in my car that‚Äôs why I put drive through in the first place. And now I‚Äôve to get in the traffic again and turn around to get in the store parking to get the Large fries. I love Burger King but not this location again !
developerResponse: {'id': 32346331, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2022-10-03T00:28:12Z'}

title: Don‚Äôt waste your money‚Ä¶
review:
Twice I‚Äôve ordered breakfast through the BK app. Twice I‚Äôve been charged for said breakfast. Twice I‚Äôve driven to the according BK restaurant to pick up my order, and twice the restaurant was closed (even though the app shows it being open at 6:30am).
This isn‚Äôt rocket science Burger King‚Ä¶ either don‚Äôt charge people until they pick up their food, or fix your app so that it performs like any other basic restaurant app. Consult McDonalds IT department if you need extra help with this.
Oh, and give me a refund. I don‚Äôt pay for imaginary breakfast.

The problem is that when I go to my email from Burger King the link opens in safari and here is the kicker: it stays on safari leaving my app unfulfilled and a shell of its former self since it fails to pass what ever key it needs to activate my account on the app.

Thanks, I will re review and rate the app after you guys fix this

title: Order could not process
review: I made an order on the app with the intention of picking up through the drive thru. I made my order and it said to continue when I arrived at the restaurant. I would have preferred to order first, but whatever. I get there and when I clicked ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù it just kept loading and said ‚Äúpayment failed.‚Äù It kept thinking I wasn‚Äôt there. I tried 3 times after getting there. I ended up having to get down and just ordered there. I used the same card to pay inside that I tried on the app. Experience at the restaurant was great, but the app totally failed.

title: Out of funnel cake fries
review:
I know these are limited time and that they also haven‚Äôt been out long once again since being brought back. It sounds to me like somebody doesn‚Äôt know how to order a truck. For all week and every day I have went through the drive thru at the Burger King in Albertville, and apparently they have been out of the funnel cake fries all week. Guntersville and Boaz hasn‚Äôt had this problem. So what‚Äôs up with Albertville?
It makes me wonder if they have them in stock but somebody is just too lazy to go get them out of the freezer!!

title: Terrible
review:
This app is the absolute worst app I‚Äôve used for fast food. Every single time I try to place an order, for some reason I have to verify my email by exiting out of app and going to my email to verify. That wouldn‚Äôt be that big of a deal but it never works. It‚Äôs just endlessly trying to verify email. 
App simply doesn‚Äôt work properly. Once you finally get email verified, trying to get to your cart to complete order is just another hassle. Screen just goes to a blank white screen. Love BK but this app couldn‚Äôt be worse.

title: Unpleasant surprises. The app deletes things.
review: The whole reason I was going to Burger King was because I wanted french fries. I put french fries in the virtual bag. When I went to check out and pay they were there. It was one of their offers. I get to the restaurant and there are no fries in my order. I look at my app past orders and the fries weren‚Äôt there. So somehow they were deleted, even though my fingers were nowhere near the top of the screen where they were.I‚Äôm so irritated I‚Äôm deleting the app and not going to Burger King at all until I forget this.

It used to be when family meals were in my cart, today it was just 2 $10 mix n match that threw this app into a tizzy!! I‚Äôm so annoyed to have to start over every time!!! title: App is easy to use, getting everything ordered not so easy
review: Twice I‚Äôve been missing significant amount of order.  Both times told nothing could be done.  BK told me it was delivery service mistake; DoorDash said it was BK responsibility because I ordered via app.   Missing 6 items first time (3 cheeseburgers  3 fries) second time missing 5 items (2 shakes & 3 sodas.). Really wish someone would‚Äôve taken responsibility but no one ever did.

title: Never had a mistake in an order!
review: I go to several fast food places and usually you get a bad order once in a while. Since the Burger King opened up near me, I find myself ordering their more often. The staff is friendly, polite, and willing to please the customer which is unique these days. I appreciate good service and they don‚Äôt disappoint!

title: Smooth , Smooth
review:
I love the Burger King app. First of all coupons are on point and actually things I want to buy. And second the delivery is great. It‚Äôs very easy to pick what I want and what I don‚Äôt want and I can pay with apply pay.

The only thing I would like is coupons for delivery (I know asking for a lot) but also saved address for delivery.

title: Why so complicated
review: Having to sign in through my email account is dumb. I don‚Äôt have email on my phone so I had to click the link through my laptop, but the desktop version doesn‚Äôt sync to the app, so it‚Äôs telling me it‚Äôs not compatible. This is entirely unnecessary for ordering a burger.

title: If only they‚Äôd deliver...
review: I‚Äôve lived across the street from Cranberry Square Burger King for 16 years and have never thought about a mobile order. I always thought it would be easier to sit in line than mobile order...boy was I wrong! Ever since I started I haven‚Äôt stopped. I encourage you to come to the cranberry square Burger King because you‚Äôll receive great service!

title: CANNOT LOG INTO APP AFTER LAST UPDATE
review:
They changed the login process to ‚Äúbe more secure‚Äù, but it‚Äôs so secure I can now no longer even use the app because Incsnt login to it anymore. I have to use the website if I want to order now.

What happens now when you try to sign into the app is that you put your email address on the sign-in page. It then sends you an email with a button/link to ‚Äúsign in now‚Äù that opens the website in your browser. From there, you‚Äôre supposed to be able to click on the button/link that says ‚Äúopen the app‚Äù.

However, it doesn‚Äôt work and instead returns the following error:
‚ÄúSafari cannot open the page because it cannot redirect to locations starting with ‚Äòburgerking‚Äô‚Äù.

When I click the link for App Support to report this issue, it takes me to an error 404 page on the Burger King website.

Hopefully someone at BK sees this review and can resolve.

title: Ordering from the Offers
review: I‚Äôve used this app directly twice and both times it took me at least 25 minutes to order because it wouldn‚Äôt be allowed me to complete my ordering for one reason or another. I like the budget-friendly menu offers but a minor glitch in the system precludes me from giving it 5 Stars. Please fix the problem because it‚Äôs a wonderful app!!

title: The Truth
review: Okay I thought the McDonald‚Äôs app was the best.. But the King has come for his crown.. I mean I some how always have a $1 whopper ready to go.. and I‚Äôm not gonna mention the penny whopper promotion.. you know wat dammit I did! And it‚Äôs real deals with real savings.. no buy 2 meals get and orange juice? Nope I mean the real deal.. I hope some competitors see this and step there app up., guess who‚Äôs getting a $5 sourdough meal today üòÅ

title: Bad customer service!
review: Went to the local Burger King and used a coupon for two whoppers plus fries. Asked to add an extra patty to ea sandwich but was told no, they could only sell them just the way the coupon said. Excuse me but I asked to BUY two more patties in addition to the sandwiches I ordered. Evidently your people are poorly trained and do not understand their job! Customer service is the most important part of business after product! Please train your employees better!

title: Could use better coupons
review: Love that you guys made an app but your coupons are the same old coupons from the sheets you used to give out. The group coupons are great but the coupons for single meals could be better, your food is cheap, make better coupons like McDonald‚Äôs did. The fact that I can get a really cheap meal at McDonalds for their big sandwiches is the reason I‚Äôm always going back there and not to Burger King even though bk is delicious

title: It says my account is already one.
review: So I am making a new account for the app. Expected it to work and get a account made, but it says that it is already a email what is logged in, so I am like ‚Äú ok ima log in. ‚Äú but it says it was not a account, so I am confused and can not use the app now. I‚Äôve tried 2 emails, both say the same thing. I do not know if it‚Äôs a bug if your system but can you please fix this.

title: Location Services Not Working; Menu Unavailable
review:
So I am thinking I‚Äôd like some BK because I learned a few days back I‚Äôve got one close by. Thought I‚Äôd check out the menu and maybe order before I go.

But the location services says the nearest location is more than 10 miles away, while on a different screen it shows one close by - 3.2 miles by car. 

Also, the only screen that tells me about food is the deals screen, which is nice, except I can‚Äôt order with it. So I can‚Äôt even see what the menu has on it, let alone order, with it. Totally a bummer app.

title: Mobile Order shows unavailable locations
review: Not all BK locations use mobile order. This app shows, and allows to be selected, any location in the database. Then you get stuck in a loop trying to order or use a deal and it keeps asking you to select a location. Please update app to not allow a locations, which does not take mobile orders, to be seen and/or selected. Thank you.

title: App will not work for months.
review: Download the app probably over a year ago maybe two. That used to work now every time I try to open it it says an error occurred signing in I‚Äôve uninstalled the app reloaded it can‚Äôt even set up a new account I tried that as well. Stores are no help but I kind of get. But just saying, this is get me from eating Burger King multiple times over the past six months from the looks of the drive-through lines compared to others, you can probably use the business.

review: Although the ‚ÄúContinue‚Äù CTA is bright red I still had trouble finding it. Almost abandoned the process b/c I thought something was broken. Consider moving the CTA to the bottom of the Checkout screen or swapping placement with with ‚ÄúChoose Payment.‚Äù Betcha your analytics will show a conversion increase by next month. Dope app overall though. Well done.

review: Good app to getting points and mobile ordering, however half the offers literally do not work. Spend $3 get free whopper Wednesday‚Ä¶ nope, no matter what you add you get charged (even though it says free). Main page shows royal perks sandwiches link ‚Äú2 for $5‚Äù and you click it ‚Äúoffer not available‚Äù. Like what? BK fix your broken links.  Can be a chore to order at to order at times as the app will time out and drop (on WiFi or cell data).

title: Awesome
review: I am giving this app a rating not because of the convenience of mobile ordering but rather because of the deals. Burger King has way better deals on their app than McDonald‚Äôs does. I‚Äôll choose Burger King 9 out of 10 times because of this. Don‚Äôt get me wrong, Burger King is better without the deals but sometimes you just get a craving for McDonald‚Äôs fries üçü

title: Needs a Slider
review: Overall the app works really well and I use it frequently. One suggestion I have is that when you are customizing your order it only gives you the option to either have the topping or not. You should really consider creating sliders so that people can have extra of some things or only a little bit of some thing instead of just yes or no.

title: Very nice customer service
review: I can‚Äôt recall the cashiers name at the drive through, but she was very nice to me. In the works we live in you don‚Äôt see people going out of there way to be nice or helpful. With that being said, it was nice to have someone who was just nice. Hopefully she will benefit from this post as I imagine people generally just complain when writing reviews.

title: Bad app
review: This is the worst app sometimes it works but most of the time no. Try to use a coupon it say not available till 6:30 but it‚Äôs 9:00. Same for lunch not available till 10:30 and it‚Äôs 4:00 in the afternoon. Wouldn‚Äôt even use it but prices are so high you need a break.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work right
