This is the case even when I switch locations. Clearly there is just something wrong with this app. I have Facebooked, Tweeted and did the ‚ÄòContact Us‚Äô about this issue to no avail. I have learned that Burger King could care less about this problem. The fact that no one has bothered to get back to me is astounding. I am deleting this app and I won‚Äôt be back to Burger King either.

title: Overall good but Sometimes hard to use
review:
1. The app should ask actively for the location access so that one could agree otherwise it won‚Äôt appear in the settings.
2. Sometimes offers are invalid but without detailed reason displayed.

title: Horrible app slow, rewards lost
review: This is by far the worst app ever. I use it maybe 2-3x a yr and every time I forget how slow the app is and regret being on the app. I would type and it would take 5 min to show up on screen. I only use it for my rewards and when I select my rewards to the cart I still get charged and than it shows I used my rewards and no going back. The restaurant employees have always been kind and help me out by offering me another free item but it‚Äôs annoying and I hate the app.

title: Meets Standard 2021 expectations. Nothing fancy
review:
As a millennial born in the 90s I have high expectations when it comes to technology. 
I expect Apple Pay. I expect offers and rewards to be easy to see and listed and current. I expect ease of use when finding stores near me. All that stuff as standard. 

None of that is ‚Äúbonus features‚Äù. 
it‚Äôs 2021, These are standard features. Nothing new or bonusy about them. 

The app has them. Therefore the app meets my standard expectations. 

Want to go above and beyond? Add the ability to pay with cryptocurrency. Then I‚Äôll raise my eyebrow. 

In terms of my standard expectations, you get 5/5 stars.

title: Needs to be fixed
review: This app constantly logs me out in the middle of orders.  When I try to have it ‚Äúmy way‚Äù the store always mixes up my orders. I frequently order without ketchup and Mayo and it usually is still on it.  The options are also screwed up.  For example, When there is no onion on the burger, it says light.  And to take the onions away you need to hit the plus button when you really should hit the minus button.  They really need to fix it.

title: Money Saving & Convenient
review: You do not always get what you pay for, and in this case that is a good thing. The coupons refresh after use and there are options for mobile ordering if that is your thing. I do not usually order by mobile but it is a nice feature should you ever need it.

review: It is so much easier to modify your order and get it correct by using the app than ordering with a live person. My order was made correctly about 30% when ordering with a live person. It‚Äôs accurate 100% of the time when ordering with app.

As a result I go there less and less because I do use your on-app coupons. I imagine I am not the only one to be frustrated with this not so new addition. I would like an answer. Oh and even though I am always signed into Facebook. Your app doesn‚Äôt recognize that even though every other app does.

Multiple times, I‚Äôve spent a large amount of time to place an order to pick up and when I go to checkout, it says the restaurant is unavailable. Then the order completely deletes it when you try to switch to a different location. I recently found out that one of the restaurants I ordered from can‚Äôt redeem crowns because they don‚Äôt know how‚Ä¶ugh. I‚Äôd take consistency over a possible discount any day of the week.

title: App is so flakey!

Messed with it for 20 minutes.  So frustrating!  Never did complete order.  Couldn‚Äôt get deal at all.  Very unhappy customer.

title: Why remove Apple Pay?
review: The BK app was fantastic until the recent major update. I use to be able to order ahead then pay via Apple Pay and go through the drive-thru to pick up my order. Now I need to enter my CC and billing address everytime I make a mobile order. What a PITA. Taco Bel and McD still use Apple Pay so they‚Äôre getting more of my fast food craving business until BK add Apple Pay back.

title: Expired payment info.
review: I use quite a few fast food mobile apps. Then my payment card expired. Just update it, no biggie, right? WRONG. Burger King and all my other apps (save one$ have NO OPTION to delete or update payment information. And just adding a new card results in errors every single time. I'm assuming it is due to having the same card number, just a new expiration and control number. Really ridiculous flaw. So far Wendy's is the only fast food app I've found without this issue. Fix this fatal error if you want to continue getting my business.

title: Options
review:
I need to be able to add options to the order ‚Ä¶ 
Ex: no onions , no pickles and so on 
Ex: no ice in drink 
EX:  cut the sandwich in half ‚Ä¶ whoopers are huge and most ppl like o have em cut in half .
When I ask them on speaker after I made my order the seem upset that I‚Äôm asking them to cut the sandwich in half ‚Ä¶ or if I ask them for no ice

title: Problems
review: So the app is either too slow or I‚Äôll get everything I want in my cart and when I place an order it sits on a screen with a BurgerKing crown at the top and the screen is white and I get nothing it does not load I have so many problems with this app

title: App Is Unresponsive
review: Compared to their competition, Jester King has always been the distant 3rd when it comes to the mobile app. I have an iPhone 12 Pro and this app feels like it wasn‚Äôt made for it: constant crashes, redeeming deals and not being added to the order, getting told at the restaurant that an item is not available before I order and drive there. It‚Äôs no wonder they are constantly empty, 2020 was the year to update their app and it seems like they put more money into their crummy advertising.

review: The coupons are basically the ones they send in the mail plus a few more. But it‚Äôs really convenient and helps save a ton. Haven‚Äôt tried the mobile ordering yet but the app seems pretty straight forward.

review:

title: Mobile app is taking order after store closed
review: Mobile app is so slow and it takes order even store is closed. Instead of checking my complain those stupid customer service told me some of Store might closed and they are independent so they can closed anytime. Very pathetic service.

They are already very expensive so the coupons helped the price and now that I can‚Äôt use it on the whopper meal I would just rather eat there at all. Out of all the Burger Kings they definitely need to except all the coupons because there a truck stop everything is already very high 10 dollars on one meal is ridiculous!!

title: Order deleted itself
review:
I had my order all ready to go. Card info in, just said I needed to tap I‚Äôm here. I got to the restaurant and went to tap I‚Äôm here and my order was gone. Sooooo I had to enter it all over again. Just a glitch to fix. 

Also, would be easier to enter amount of item ie chicken nuggets you want for your meal as you‚Äôre entering rather than having to wait until the very end and add when you‚Äôre confirming your order. 

If these two things were fixed I‚Äôd rate it a 5 for sure!!!!!!!!

title: Amazing

title: Can‚Äôt really ‚ÄúHave it your way‚Äù
review:
So, given that burger kings slogan has always been ‚ÄúHave it your way‚Äù, you can‚Äôt really do that with this app. 

I frequently eat Burger King without the bread on sandwiches, but there app doesn‚Äôt allow you to remove the bread. 

This fact immensely saddens me as I can‚Äôt double check the nutrition info prior to eating the food. I can do that with the Wendy‚Äôs app though. Burger King, why are you letting Wendy‚Äôs be better about customizing food?

title: Keeps crashing plus more
review: Every time I go to order the app crashes. Then when I finally order the app stops tracking my order and I just get blank white screen so I can never tell where my order is. Then the last recent time I was about to order and I finally received my order it was wrong and they forgot items out of it and I had no way to report the issue or request a refund.

title: Updated app messed up ordering, and no Apple Pay option?
review: Made an order with the updated app today, but instead of having to complete the order when you get to the restaurant so they start making it right before you pick it up, the order completed as soon as I entered my payment info. Also miss being able to pay with Apple Pay from the app. I preferred the old version and won‚Äôt be using the new app anymore if the ordering still completes as soon as you finish, with no option to cancel the order.

title: You can‚Äôt add extras
review:
My first time using this app and I was NOT impressed. At BK you can have it your app, but with the app you can only have it their way. I like to order extra items on my food , for example: extra Lettuce, extra pickles and such. I CAN‚ÄôT do this in the app! Great, now I have to order from McDonalds but at least on their app, I can have it my way! 

I just tried ordering on their app and you can‚Äôt add items that aren‚Äôt on the original item, BUT I can still add on extras to what‚Äôs already on the burger!  Due to this, it‚Äôs still closest to having it my way!

title: Can‚Äôt have it my way!!
review: I like that the app is offering more deals than before. The app could include more breakfast deals. Also, one down side to the app is the fact that I can‚Äôt have my food my way. The app gives very little options to customize the items added to order and at the location they will not adjust the app order. This feature needs to be upgraded to do things like extra or lite.

title: Burger King App
review:
This app was just updated and my wife and I was really disappointed with the amount of coupons and especially the length of time before they‚Äôre repopulated after use.  We live a fair distance away and never receive paper coupons in the mail so we relied heavily on the mobile ones.  Being retired and on a limited budget we will no longer be able to frequent your restaurant.  Please reconsider stacking up the mobile offers the way the restaurant locals get the paper offers so we can enjoy coming in on a regular basis too!
Regards,
Steve C

title: What‚Äôs the point in the app?
review: Ordered on app in store to get deals only available on app. Waited 20 minutes and asked what‚Äôs up. They said they didn‚Äôt start the order. What‚Äôs the point in ordering on the app if I have to go talk to someone? App says it will be ready asap. Developers and management checkout Wendy‚Äôs app. Much better experience. Pendleton Oregon store, Please make my food when you say you will.  Keep your promises.  Foods not as fresh, and service is slow.

title: Delivery does not sync.
review: Please remove the delivery option from the app. If you are hosting on DoorDash, simply navigate traffic there. Your tracking system does not sync up with DoorDash. I will get messages that my order will delivery at X time and it will have already been 5 minutes pass that. I understand efficiency and providing options. I don‚Äôt understand mishandling timeframes for your customers. This review is inching towards a 2 hour wait for my order and your restaurant is 2 miles down the road.

title: Switched from McDonald‚Äôs to BK! Thanks for Deals!
review:
You guys did a great job! Love your deals with whopper ! App works great! So much better then a year ago! Sandwiches and fries are delicious! 
After McDonald‚Äôs my stomach hurts, and never happens with BK! So thanks for all your team work! Keep doing it great and develop! People will see and appreciate that!
Thankful client.

title: Not 24/7?!
review:
Why can‚Äôt I order any day I want?! It‚Äôs one thing if the nearby locations are closed, but just not be able to deliver?! Why would I get the app if the main thing it had going was delivery any day?!

Why wasn‚Äôt there a notification that certain locations were not available?! I need reliable service if I‚Äôm to even bother to use the app.

Who makes an app that doesn‚Äôt even work right?! Serious why does it keep getting worse?! They finally added the spicy chicken jr, but the app glitches too much! 

Fix the app and service already! There should never be a reason for a customer to not be able to order something...using a fast food delivery product!

title: Pretty easy
review: Sometimes less is more for food deliver apps. The app doesn‚Äôt over complicate things with too many options or menu items. You can still have it your way and get the order done in less than 2 mins.

title: I normally love this app
review: I was so frustrated after trying to place my most recent order that I had to pull over and calm my nerves. Something is off about the Offers section. I could not see what was in my cart that was using my points, but every time I tried to add something else, I was told my item would exceed the points purchase amount. I ended up paying full price instead of continuing to fill around with the app.

title: Worst Fast Food App Ever
review: Only giving 5 stars so everyone can see how terrible this app is. Add an item, go to check bag, all of a sudden they can‚Äôt find my order. So annoyed I‚Äôm ordering from elsewhere just because this has been like this as long as I‚Äôve tried using the app.

title: Improvement.
review: I‚Äôve used the ap before. There were update issues and problems ordering.  This time it was easy and the t-mobile  offer showed up without a problem and was easy to use.  Great Burger King especially with the pandemic.

title: Can‚Äôt complete orders
review: The app used to get me through, bug free, to allow me to complete online orders. The last two times I‚Äôve made such an attempt nothing can get added to my cart. Upon clicking into menu items, I either get a completely blank screen or the menu item customization screen with required fields not showing, not letting me progress further. Frustrating because it used to be a super convenient and fast way to get food into my mouth.

title: Good, But Annoying
review:
Not being able to edit an item is annoying, but I came across an issue where I applied an offer, but then the items in my cart didn‚Äôt apply to the offer, so the whole order was null.

Okay fine, but I couldn‚Äôt remove the offer from my cart, and I was stuck. I had to sign out, close the app, and restart my whole order again. Please add a button to remove offer!

title: Game Changer App
review: I used to be a very infrequent shopper at Burger King, maybe just one visit a year. The BK app is the Best fast food app on the market, with consistently better deals and coupons than all other fast food options. It‚Äôs completely changed my shopping habits, and now I frequently choose BK, at least six times a month!

title: Stole my money
review:
UPDATE: now they respond to this review with a broken link for me to send in a request for support. WHICH IS WHAT I ALREADY DID!
I placed an order thru the app, and when I went to pick it up the staff was so rude and pushy I had no time to check my order before leaving. They left out half my order and what was there was extremely stale and hard GROSS!! Customer service at the 888 number from the app said they would send me an email right away with either a refund or credit. Never received it! Never going back to any of these restaurants again.

title: They took my money, and could not refund
review: If I could give no stars I would absolutely do it! I ordered from the app and normally it updates to your location, well one particular time it did not, so I went in the location I was at- they could not help me they informed me that they didn‚Äôt train them on mobile orders and the location it ordered was 60 miles away! I emailed the customer service and they replied they could not refund me! So they just took my money because I didn‚Äôt get my food from the other location! I‚Äôm truly disappointed!

title: BAD Update
review: I updated the app and now I can‚Äôt order through the app if I want one of the coupons. Also it is jittery now and jumps up and down on the page when I‚Äôm scrolling causing me to have to scroll back down to the bottom every few seconds. I liked the app the way it was before. The only thing that needed changing was the ability to order lunch items in the morning since my burger king does full menu all day. Kinda disappointed in this update.

title: What Happened??
review: This app was great but now when I try to mobile order I get an error message. I can get all the way to the payment screen and then there‚Äôs a long delay followed by a prompt that‚Äôs something like ‚Äúcould not obtain item pricing‚Äù and you can choose ‚Äúretry‚Äù which fails again or you can choose ‚Äúdismiss‚Äù. Not eating anymore BK until you fix it. The convenience of the app is the only reason I eat there anyway.. You had the most stable and user friendly fast food app out there but whatever happened recently has wrecked it.

title: Pretty good But...
review: The mobile order and offers are pretty good.  The only thing lacking is customizations like extra ketchup or mayo.  You can it add or subtract a condiment but can‚Äôt ask for extra. You also can‚Äôt ask for no ice or extra ice in your drinks.  And the impossible whopper is off the app but I can order it at the restaurant. These shortcomings force me to order at the restaurant rather to use the app.

title: Love the app but‚Ä¶
review: App is easy to use. Very user friendly. The only thing is I wish when selecting item if there could a spot to type a specific note. You can customize your item by selecting or unselecting condiments but I don‚Äôt select to add cheese to whopper and I get cheese every time. Which is why I wish there was a note section to notate ‚Äòno cheese‚Äô.

title: Mobile order is a joke
review: So today I tried to redeem BK‚Äôs whopper for a penny. I thought it was strange you needed to drive to a McDonald‚Äôs to redeem the coupon, but I did so anyway. After driving to the nearest McDonald‚Äôs over a 15 minute drive from my house, I was not able to place a mobile order at the Burger King in my city. Apparently, my city‚Äôs Burger King is so behind that they do not offer the mobile order option. This was ridiculously inconvenient and I have decided that I will not be supporting BK in the future. By the way, I ate at McDonald‚Äôs today since you made me go there üòÇ

title: No ability to change or cancel
review:
If you make an order and need to change or cancel you can‚Äôt . Worse, if you use apple pay they won‚Äôt even refund your money - you‚Äôll need to dispute the charges with your bank. For a large corporate app this is ridiculously poor service, not to mention it is profoundly unethical .

Thank you for the developer response.  I did that but was told to simply pick up my order and the staff member added $5 to my app account.  That only added insult.

title: Simplicity and Convenience
review: I don‚Äôt typically review apps, but the BK app makes everything so easy. I‚Äôve tried a couple of their competitor‚Äôs apps and they usually link you outside of the app for special deals or delivery, but BK gets it all done in the same place. Best fast food app out there by far.

title: Not Happy
review: I ordered from Burger King at 6:32. My food didn‚Äôt arrive until 8:20. No one could locate the driver. My food was cold and the crispy chicken was burnt to a crisp.  Very angry, disappointed and unsatisfied!!  Driver said he hadn‚Äôt been contacted for a pickup until 6 minutes before it was delivered. This should have been zero stars!!!

title: Love the app
review: Even tho they should have the deals for delivery also... But I love Burger King and love that you guys made a app

title: Not working
review: I placed two separate orders and was charged for both but only one was placed when I arrived. I showed my proof of purchase on my phone and credit card charge and after waiting I still was unable to receive my 2nd order. The discounts and deals are great if they worked properly.

review: Most of the time this app is great. But more than once when I add an offer and go to order it, that whole group has an error and won‚Äôt open when every other one will making it impossible to actually use the offer. Other than that the app is convenient

title: App never worked for my wife and I
review:
Each time my wife and I tried to use the app at 3 different BK locations we would get a message ‚Äúproblem communicating with the restaurant‚Äù and the order would not go through. We tried a few times over the course of 2 months, thinking it may be just a temporary issue, but was never successful.

Deleted the app and cannot recommend it to others. The drive-thru works fine.

title: App not user friendly.
review:
I thought the app would make it easier to order and pay ahead with card to avoid handling cash. Nope! You have to ‚Äòsign up‚Äô each time you open the app, then wait for email, open email, click the link (within 3 minutes) to open and then sign in to the app again. 

By the time I get through this process, I‚Äôm frustrated and don‚Äôt feel like BK. There‚Äôs 5 other fast food places (3 which can be seen from BK parking lot) and 2 others just down the road. 

Please make the app user friendly... I know I would be more likely to use it!

One should be able to tap the app and place an order quickly. 

If anyone from BK corporate reads this, please change this app. 
The ability to use Apple pay would be nice. Not sure if that‚Äôs been added in the month since I used app, because I never completed an order!

title: It‚Äôs A Scam
review:
I made an order that didn‚Äôt go through, and yet it still charged me.  When I called services to get it fixed, I got someone who was barely able to speak English properly.  Also called the Burger King store I was ordering from, and they say they have no idea how the app works.  I should think if you‚Äôre going to make an app available, you should train your stores how to use it!  That is providing you even know how to work your own app to train them!
So to the consumer, don‚Äôt even bother installing this app despite the 4+ star rating.

title: BK app
review: I just updated this version of this app to the new look and it doesn‚Äôt even let me login it keeps sending me links to login. can you please fix this problem before it gets worse. I love this app it makes my day so much easier to use because I use this app when i‚Äôm riding my bike to the burger king in midland park and if I don‚Äôt want to stand on a huge line I use this app.

title: Still Have To Wait
review: So yeah I like this app as I can pay online and order quickly and easily at home.  However, I dislike that I am still waiting through the lines that I still get pulled up and have to wait up to 5 minutes sometimes for my food.  So the skip the line stuff is so not true.  You still wait as if you ordered at the restaurant.

title: Confusion
review: It seems as though every time I use this app the staff has no clue what‚Äôs going on I get the wrong orders or order is wrong. I like the convenience factor of ordering paying and just going up to the window but realizing it was probably just easier to go through the drive-through the conventional way

review: When they rolled out this app I loved the idea. Of them having an app to order from and just pick it up. However this app for me since the beginning up until now have issues. THANK YOU BURGER KING

title: Quick refunds
review: I appreciate the quick refunds I request in the app. If only there was a system to pick up orders when the dining room is closed. If you don't have a car, the only option is to cancel unless you sandwich yourself between the cars in the drive thru and I doubt that's allowed.

Update: I was contacted twice about my issue and it was actually resolved the next day. I‚Äôm actually impressed they responded fast and diligently! The app now works perfect and I will enjoy the coupons and deals! You have a customer for life after this experience! Well at least on my heavy carb days lol

title: Don‚Äôt use this for delivery!!
review:
They use door dash to deliver. If there is something wrong with your order no one will help you. I ordered using this app the DoorDash driver contacted me and told me they did not have my sandwich and they were going to make you something similar. I ordered a ‚Äúdouble steakhouse king‚Äù. They gave me a sandwich with a drop of Mayo, a single tomato, and pickles. I at least expected a bacon whooper this was a joke. 

TLDR:
Don‚Äôt order delivery with this app. You can‚Äôt hold anyone accountable or get compensation for a messed up order.

title: Great support
review: I‚Äôve been having issues with Apple Pay in the app.  Sent a message to BK support who fairly quickly replied that there is a known issue with zip codes and it should be fixed soon.  I‚Äôm leaving 5 stars because, while I did run into a bug, I am unaccustomed to such rapid and personalized support responses.  Thank you Julia P!

title: Bad customer service. App broken
review: The app will not let me add a new card and gives me a pop up saying ‚Äúoops something went wrong, try again‚Äù even when trying to place an order. Customer service won‚Äôt help, I get an email from the same two people saying to delete the cards even though I tell them it won‚Äôt allow me to add a new one. Then they stop replying at all. Half the time if the app does work it charges you twice and you won‚Äôt get your money back. Don‚Äôt get this app, it‚Äôs a waist of time and money.

Looking forward to the new updates that will surely come in the future. P.S. Dear B.K., Love the impossible whopper, but please bring out more vegetarian options! :) ty

title: Burger King Coupons
review: I appreciate as a senior on a very fixed income, that I can access coupons on your app and feel like I have gotten a decent deal on my meal. Without the coupons, I wouldn‚Äôt be able to justify eating at BK and that would be a shame!!!! Thank you!!

title: Waste of time
review: Had a 30 minute break for lunch.  Wife wanted me to get an 8.99 two whopper meal - had to get the app, sign up an account, login to it, and place order there to redeem that deal.  Went to pay with Apple Pay - failed.  Tried to enter CC info directly - failed.  No option to pay in store.  So because of a technical ussue, I could not get this deal.  Most of my lunchbreak wasted, ended up getting the 2 whoppers for $6 (because that‚Äôs available in person without coupon) and not purchasing fries/drinks.  Will uninstall app.

title: Cannot cancel accidental order
review: So I went to browse the menu, and before I was finished, I went to cart to see what payment options there were. I didn‚Äôt even hit confirm and it completed my order. Usually no big deal, right? All the other food apps will let you cancel the order and won‚Äôt actually charge you until you come to pick it up. NOT THIS ONE! They have no way to cancel and the charge is already showing on my credit card. Think twice before using this app and for even visiting Burger Crook!
developerResponse: {'id': 14371056, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/contact-support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2020-03-31T20:46:50Z'}

title: Good app to save $
review: I‚Äôm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because you can‚Äôt use the coupons for whoppers or whopper juniors until after 10:30 am ~ those items are on your menu ALL day long, so why can‚Äôt you use the coupons on the app? That just doesn‚Äôt make sense to me.

title: New policy
review: I was informed by a store manager today that online and mobile purchases must come and be picked up in store and not drive-through anymore (company policy). That eliminates half the value of the app of ordering ahead, and contradicts the practices of all of their competitors.  The app needs to stop directing customers to go to the drive-through. A expected three minute wait took 15 minutes because of this change.

title: STOLE MY MONEY!!! DO NOT USE!
review:
I made an order based on the websites hours of a particular bk. The website says it closed at 11, so I made a purchase at 9:30. The bk actually closed at 9. It took my order and my money even though it was closed. Customer service says they cannot refund my money. Really!

You have my cc number on file and can certainly take my money but lack the ability to refund it. By the way, the bk was located inside a walmart. I pressed im here when I parked. Went inside and it was locked. 
I will be getting in touch with bbb. This is just robbery.

title: Can't retrieve prices
review: Used to be decent, but around the time Stranger Things promotion started, the app coincidentally started to slow down when retrieving data from their servers. Something is seriously wrong when a customer can't retrieve prices (therefore can't proceed to checkout) over both LTE and verizon fios (nyc area). Kinda makes you wonder if they intentionally hold off on server upgrades, to minimize losses from the food prizes and discounts. You pretty much have to order at the restaurant, since server issues prevent any transactions via the app

title: BK‚Äôs app is Bass Ackwards!!
review:
I find it odd and quite perplexing that I am not able to look at the actual menu without first selecting a store (not the problem) then being prompted for drive thru, eat in, or take out and actually starting an order first. I don‚Äôt get it. What‚Äôs the intent?

The deals can be seen right away, and that‚Äôs great! But if I‚Äôm trying to create a meal and figuring out what it‚Äôll cost, I can‚Äôt do that without starting an order. Every other app I use allows you to look at items and place them in the basket to order.

BK‚Äôs app is Bass Ackwards!!

title: Hate the update
review: I hate the update that makes you order from the app to use coupons. We would come to BK because I could use coupons and feed my family for a decent price. Now, most of the coupons are for mobile ordering only. No option to use in store. You lost a family of 4 that came at least once a week. Forcing people to only use mobile order is wrong. I don‚Äôt ant to keep my credit card on file anywhere.

title: No ‚Äúhave it your way‚Äù to be found in the app
review: So an update first off your contact is button in the app doesn‚Äôt work, second please give items more options on what to remove this morning I tried ordering a sausage eggnormaous burrito and I couldn‚Äôt pick the meat or remove the spicy sauce still don‚Äôt have a no salt option on the fries or tots like this app DOA NOT follow the Burger King motto of ‚Äúhave it your way‚Äù because I can‚Äôt have it my way as far as the app is concerned it that breaks my heart because I love BK

Genuinely debating on just deleting it at this point.

title: Where do I begin
review:
First I made sure my app was up to date, and it is. Next I tried ordering several times without success. I keep getting error messages and messages that no restaurants in my area deliver. title: Never takes my payment
review: About three weeks ago this app started telling me there was a problem with my payment method. First with my debit card, then with my credit card. I removed them and re-entered to no avail. It‚Äôs so frustrating to be able to see all of the coupons on the app and not be able to use them at the drive thru when your app won‚Äôt work. I‚Äôm tired of paying several dollars more when I downloaded and use the app.

title: Awesome eats and deals
review: This app gives you great deals and allows you to mobile pay so you don‚Äôt have to deal with awkward conversations with the drive thru ordering person. You can pick up in store or drive thru and speed up your whole process. Get the app and stop holding up the line!!!

title: Glitchy and slow. Clueless employees
review:
It takes forever to load. Every step of the process involves tedious loading. 
Once you finally place your order then you click ‚ÄúI‚Äôm Here!‚Äù and you‚Äôre informed that your food is being prepared and to just pull up to the window. This doesn‚Äôt happen. You have to first pull up to the order window and let them know you placed a mobile order. Then you pull up to the second window and pick up your food. I don‚Äôt mind this process but wish it was clearer on the app.

title: Customer service üëåüèΩ
review: They‚Äôre in app customer service is actually pretty good. Had an issue placing an order at a location that was apparently closed and they gave me a refund plus a extra coupon with the quickness.

title: No time saver
review: It seems like you are ordering and paying on the app, but in reality you have to get in line and wait until the cashier pushes a button to start the order.  I guess that saves the time it takes having to state your order but that's really all the time it saves.  They do offer deals online that are not available elsewhere, but it won't speed up your service.

title: Subscribed to daily coffee then hell breaks loose
review: I subscribed to daily coffee so i had credit cards saved for monthly payment also the coupons are available in this app. very convenient when it was working until it would not work when im about to pick up my food. 99% of time it will fail due to server error and the money i paid for the subscription didnt last a month. Im still subscribed but i cant get my coffee. This is theft. Absolute garbage. The customer service are quick to reply but has no resolution

title: What a scam
review: Burger kings had a suppose it promotion where you could get a burger for a penny if you signed up to use their app and installed their app and were a new user. I followed all the requirements and gave them all of my information and then no matter which Burger King I select it refuses to allow me to use the coupon saying ‚Äúcoupon not valid at this location quote. What a scam! I removed my account uninstalled will uninstall the app, and posted online with already a few hundred people that have looked at my post on Slickdeals about this scam.

title: This app is garbage
review: Constantly giving errors when trying to log in/create an account, trying to find a restaurant to order at, or when adding a card to pay with. It‚Äôs extremely frustrating to put an entire order together and not be able to submit it on more than one device. After messing with it for 20 minutes I‚Äôm just gonna go get some McDonald‚Äôs. Burger King is one of those restaurants that I would eat at if I could get a deal on it, but without the app that‚Äôs just not gonna happen.

title: Quit asking my location, etc!
review: Where do I start. I tried selecting my favorite BK location and app still demands my location for availability. When I get past that, I try selecting from the deals. I ordered one and the app wouldn‚Äôt let me add to the order. A couple backtracks later and the app locks up on the blinking series of ‚Äúwaiting‚Äù dots. In frustration of wasted time, I shut the app and wait at the understaffed BK‚Äôs drive-thru. Not the first time I‚Äôve had to do this. Why can‚Äôt you simplify it???

title: Limited options and buggy
review:
For a restaurant that‚Äôs motto is ‚ÄúHave it your way‚Äù the options in the app are extremely limited. I can‚Äôt take off the bun and the drink option are limited to coke, Diet Coke, Dr. Pepper and Sprite. No lemonade, no water. 
After making all the selections for my family and trying to go to check out, it fails and says my restaurant is not available and removes everything from my cart so I have to start over, even though I know my restaurant is available.

review:

That is unacceptable seeing as I had full data service according to Ookla Speed Test.

FIX THE SERVERS

This happens more than 50%   of the time a king ordering a chore as I try to find the culprit in my order. I am not doing anything special other than removing or adding the available options.

review: Placed an order to get to the restaurant to find out what I ordered was out of stock. Or so it was said, only to find out they had more just ‚Äúdidn‚Äôt want to make them‚Äù which was beyond weird seeing as the store wasn‚Äôt close to closing nor was there a line of people waiting! Furthermore I ordered ahead on the app! Very disappointed

title: Original Chicken Sandwich and Fries
review: Congrats to Burger King Grandville...you nailed it all food was hot...fresh...served up with the public safety in mind. I am impressed overall with your location. I had stopped buying Burger King quite awhile ago but your consistent service and quality food brought me back.

title: Terrible
review: Let‚Äôs see one the map on this app is terrible you can‚Äôt zoom in to see where your carrier is so good luck ordering on a college campus because they won‚Äôt be able to find you. Then they give you numbers to call the carrier and then never answer I never got my food so now I have to wait 3 to 5 days for a refund which is ridiculous because who wants to wait that long for a refund don‚Äôt support this restaurant through this app it‚Äôs a terrible delivery service and you‚Äôd be better off using DoorDash or Uber eats.

title: Whopper Wednesday? Whaaaat?
review:
An item in my cart was unavailable at my chosen restaurant. My options were ‚ÄúRemove Items‚Äù or ‚ÄúEmpty Cart‚Äù. 

It would be nice to have a Choose Another Restaurant option. Otherwise you‚Äôre forced to remove unavailable items, choose a different restaurant manually, and then replace the previously unavailable items in your cart.

title: Probably the worst app for any food company
review: Honestly I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve come across a more redundant app for a food establishment. Where to even start. The fact to sign in you have to then go to your email to confirm your sign in. The fact that the coupons would freeze as you put them on your order or just show error pages. Once you go to pay it doesn‚Äôt accept any form of payment until you try and place it for literally the 64th time!

There have been multiple times I have been denied my coupons whether it‚Äôs through T-Mobile or just the Burger King app. I‚Äôm tired of the terrible customer service and lack of consistency! The only way I could get the transaction to process was not to modify anything. In conclusion, no...you cannot have it your way. And isn‚Äôt that BK‚Äôs whole schtick?

title: Ridiculously bad
review:
Come on, it‚Äôs 2020- Get your act together Burger King. I couldn‚Äôt even customize my whopper properly. I hate mayo, but I could only choose light, regular, or extra. How about ‚Äúnone‚Äù??? Not even an option, same with a bunch of other things. Overall an unnecessarily complicated process. 

And when we went to pick up the order, the guy said they ‚Äúdidn‚Äôt even have applesauce on the menu anymore.‚Äù Yet it was there on the app for the kid‚Äôs meal. What‚Äôs the point of having an app? I won‚Äôt be going back to BK anytime soon.

review: Mobile ordering has not been working for last year, tried many times and every time: problem retrieiving price item‚Äù and instead of price there are xxxxx-es. A year ago I wrote about this but there haven‚Äôt been response so far

title: Awesome app
review: No issues. App is straightforward for your order! Even asks you if this the right location or not so you can the change location as necessary before the whole transaction is done.

title: First and last time using this app
review: I placed an order through the app. When I arrived at the BK location, I clicked the I‚Äôm here button on the app. After waiting almost 20 min, an employee asked what I was waiting on. I told her and she said I should have told someone I was there. Wouldn‚Äôt that defeat the purpose of clicking on the I‚Äôm here button? They didn‚Äôt even start my order until that point. I ordered Ranch and Bbq sauce but the employee told me they only have Bbq and buffalo. I asked for buffalo instead of the ranch but they didn‚Äôt give me any.

title: App works great but a suggestion for the app
review: Okay it‚Äôs a small suggestion but I would like to be able to ask for ‚ÄúNo Ice‚Äù when ordering drinks. Also if the option to substitute Onion Rings for French Fries was available then I would be totally happy with the app.

title: Easy, friendly app
review: I like how easy this app is to use. Item category is very clear and clicking on the items I desire is quick and easy. I like how the offer apps are nice, clear and easy to redeem. And checkout is a breeze.

title: Much more intuitive
review: Love the new refresh of the app! It is so much easier to find items! I used to find it very difficult to navigate but now it‚Äôs one of my favorite apps to use because of the convenience and reliability

title: Never seems to work.
review: Not sure how many times I have had my order completed and ready to be placed when it tells me the store was closed even though I did a delivery order. When it closes the store it completely wipes out my whole order and I have to start from scratch. They removed the ability to use in app coupons for delivery orders for some random reason. I will never use this app again just because it's just broken.

review: Maybe it‚Äôs my fault for ordering burger king in the first place but why in god‚Äôs name does it erase my entire order MULTIPLE times??? It doesn‚Äôt even tell me why or which item was the issue. And then it eventually lets me place the order anyway. Why does it have to get rid of my entire cart and start over????

title: Much better
review:
This app used to be straight up garbage. 

The menus would be all over the place and the navigation was not intuitive. 
I‚Äôm assuming this app has been updated since I was able to bounce around from menu to locations to payments and back to the menu seamlessly.

title: Delivery too long
review:
Almost every time I order from the app it take more than an hour to delivery the food, whereas on Door Dash or other delivery apps, it takes half that which blows my mind.
Even then, most of the drivers are doing other deliveries since I can see that they don‚Äôt come to my location but make 3-4 other stops before, and that ends up making my food cold.
I honestly hate ordering from the app and now just order from other delivery apps.

title: Love BK‚Äôs Mobile App
review: I love being able to order at home, have everything paid for with my pre-order and saved credit card, & then wait just a little bit once I notify the app that I‚Äôm at BK to get my fresh cooked order. I especially like it when I want to use the drive thru.

title: Great deals
review: Best thing about this app is the great deals that are on there regularly. I‚Äôve been eating at Burger King much more than I did before because of that. Only reason I didn‚Äôt get five stars is because some of the Burger King‚Äôs don‚Äôt do mobile ordering. That‚Äôs not the fault of the app,But it can be frustrating nevertheless.

title: Great deals but slow
review: Using the app gives you access to some good deals but opening and searching takes a minute or two - literally - to load before you can scroll. Make sure to open it early enough that you aren‚Äôt waiting to order already. Worth the wait for the savings.

title: Cart
review: I will never use the app to do an order. I had a coupon on the app for a free whopper. I wanted to do my order and pickup. The restaurant I wanted to use doesn‚Äôt do online orders.  I was forced to finish the order and drive an extra 10 miles to another restaurant. I couldn‚Äôt change to just redeem at the restaurant. Also when I went to pickup the order the whopper was not even on the order. WOW. Never again.

title: Old app-perfect. New app-broken
review: The updates on this app are verrrrrry buggy. You have to sign in every time. But not with a password, you get a link in your email. And it tells you you may have to wait 3 minutes for it. You click on it and it then tells you something went wrong. You then have to repeat the same steps about 4 times before it finally works. Please work on this some more. We use the app often but today it was like running an obstacle course. In the mud and in the rain.

title: I always save when I‚Äôm craving bk
review: I love bk. I just don‚Äôt have that many available from where I live. This app always has great offers ready to go when I‚Äôm really craving it. Especially on the original chicken sandwiches. That‚Äôs what I‚Äôm getting now actually! Lol

title: Let us ‚Äúhave it our way‚Äù
review: You only allow for some customization on the app.  You can‚Äôt get it cut in half or add any extras on. It‚Äôs too messy to eat a whopper whole, it needs to be cut in half so everything doesn‚Äôt fall out. There are some good deals on the app. I loved he $1 whopper but then you went ahead and can only order it online.  Why? Especially since I can‚Äôt order it the way I want?  Fix it please.

title: New App is terrible, went to eat elsewhere because of it
review: I have had this app for a couple years, worked great. New update requires email, login, etc just to use coupons. Would guess they are trying to get you to just mobile order instead of counter order, so they can send you endless emails and get your credit card.  I did not try mobile, as reviews are all nightmares if you do.  Old app was very simple to use, Not anymore. I walked out of a Burger King and went to another place. New app is terrible.

title: Menu
review: I love the app and the deals it offers the only thing i would like to see added is a section on the menu where you can add extra condiments. Just make it easier than having to do a separate order when you get there for sauce. Thank you!

title: Misleading point system
review: Every time I try to order the mix and match breakfast biscuit the app tells me it is not available at current location.  Then I walk in to said current location and order the mix and match biscuit at the counter.  Every time.  Clearly it IS available at my location!  Result is I can‚Äôt accumulate the reward points due to me for my purchases.  Very poor customer service!

review:
Update: Same old sh!t. Still doesn‚Äôt work. ZERO response from the developers. Thanks for nothing.

Since the advent of 5G, I cannot get the app to launch and connect to the website unless I‚Äôm on WiFi. It just sits and the endless ‚Äúdots‚Äù run across the screen on my iPhone 12. Back in early June, I still had an iPhone 6S, and everything (mostly) worked without a problem. Now, it simply doesn‚Äôt work at all (except on WiFi). So, I don‚Äôt eat at Burger King anymore.

title: Burgers anyone?

title: The App helps make their food affordable
review: Grateful for the deals they make available on the application. I usually pack lunch but sometimes the job carries you through dinner and I‚Äôm able to afford the impossible sandwiches to make the drive home.

title: Constant technical issues
review: Most times I can‚Äôt even get past the 3 loading dots to open the app and when I do I‚Äôll get 90% through my order and then it‚Äôll tell me the restaurant isn‚Äôt available anymore and I have to start all over (the restaurant is available and I can place the order in person no problem). review: I love The BK lounge one of the very few places I enjoy to eat n the shakes r the best cause it‚Äôs not liquid diarrhea out of a machine n I love when I get it my way n get a lil extra strawberry in my shakes simply the best don‚Äôt ever change it maybe bigger size tho.   Food for thought

title: Easy to use, coupons galore, saves money
review: So far not too many issues. Some coupons aren‚Äôt available at my local store, but most of them are, and I haven‚Äôt run into payment issues with the app.

title: Broken app
review: Every time I‚Äôve tried to order this past month, I get ‚ÄúRestaurant is unavailable. Your order cannot be completed.‚Äù The app lets me search and add everything I want, then gives me the error when I go to check out. It used to only do this when I was using certain coupon deals, but now it‚Äôs every time, no matter which restaurant location I‚Äôm trying to order from, whether I‚Äôm trying to use a deal or not. title: Easy to use

I would pay extra for dipping options however we don‚Äôt get the option unless getting chicken fingers or nuggets . I would enjoy this service even more if you had the spice options!

review: I‚Äôve been in the parking lot for 30 mins. It won‚Äôt load the menu or the location options. But the offers pages and main page work fine. It doesn‚Äôt come up under location services and never asked me. So I think it just doesn‚Äôt know where I am.

title: Completely unusable
review: Tried using multiple times, each time given a ‚Äúcannot complete your order, try again later‚Äù. title: Lacks features
review: Why can‚Äôt the stores cancel orders? Why can‚Äôt I cancel an order? Shouldn‚Äôt I be able to specify when I arrive to make my order then? title: Great customer service
review: The food is great and the customer service is even better. The staff is always very friendly to my autistic son! The manager Ronimel is especially great, he always greats us with a big smile and pleasant attitude! I would like to give him kudos for his professionalisms, he is a great asset to your company. Thanks for all you do Sandra.

title: Bait and Switch
review: So I‚Äôve been using coupons on the site for quite some time, at some point apparently it logged me out because I was showing certain deals selected one attempted to use at the drive-through, then asked me to login. After logging in the deal is Hill on her available even though the expiration date was very far in the future‚Ä¶ This was the whole purpose of my trip to begin with, now I‚Äôm at the restaurant giving trouble she‚Äôs a nice girl at the window. Shame on you for bait and switch.

title: Updates Break The App
review: Any time there is a new update for the app it prevents me from even using the app unless I delete it and redownload it. Every single time. I will just be stuck in loading purgatory seeing those three dots move but nothing comes of it. Not even after a half an hour of waiting. Find out what‚Äôs wrong with your in-app updates because they‚Äôre not helping. It‚Äôs a real inconvenience when you are in line about to order and you can‚Äôt get your deals to pop up. Real inconvenient.

title: APP regressed to non-functional
review: I have a Burger King within walking distance, so to save time, I used the previous version to order my food, use coupons and then I could show up, get my food eat and get back in a timely manner. The latest version does not allow direct access - you need to get an email link and does not support mobile ordering. If I have to go in before ordering, I might as well delete this app. I will give it 1 more week, and then it‚Äôs off my phone, probably for good.

title: Horrible update
review: Why would you update and by update I mean completely change something that‚Äôs not broken. Why am I having to log in through email? This is a fast food app not a banking app. There does not need to be that level of security. Also what happened to all the coupons? There used to be around 10, now just 1. When McDonald‚Äôs made their coupons useless I just went there less. I suppose I will be doing that with you guys as well. Please go back to the old app and coupons.

title: Difficult and useless
review: Difficult to use. It does not save my ‚Äúfavorite ‚Äú orders and does not allow the ‚Äúreorder‚Äù option. I have to go through the hassle of finding my items and adding them to the cart every time. It stores my payment info, but no other data. The BK store doesn‚Äôt make the order until you arrive and ask for your food. It‚Äôs easier and faster to just pull through the drive in to make an order.

title: Horrifically bad
review:
I‚Äôve used this app 3 times.  First time, store told they don‚Äôt honor any of the deals in the app.  I left without a purchase.  Second time it worked without issue.  Third time payment went through and the guy tells me he doesn‚Äôt have the order and I need to call customer service.  So I left am writing this at McDonalds.  66% of the time Burger King lost business from me because of this horrible app.

There‚Äôs no number in the app...   I messaged them, I assume I‚Äôll get the money back but as of now they‚Äôve stolen $5.68 from me.

title: Need option to customize Ice in Drinks
review: I have to tell them no ICE everytime I pick up my mobile order. Other than that, the service is great and fast. The app is acting up recently. It takes 4-10 minutes to order because it‚Äôs loading or having problems. Sometimes it just doesn‚Äôt work and I have to walk inside. This happened after the recent update.

title: Allows order and payment for out of stock items
review:
Downloaded the app and placed an order.  When I got to the restaurant they had to look up my order (so they didn‚Äôt start filling the order until after I got there).  2 of the 5 items I ordered were out of stock.  The app saved me no time and in fact made the order more difficult because they had to deal with a refund and a substitution.  Would have been more efficient to just place the order at the counter.

Deleted the app.

title: Niiiiice
review:
Best food app around. Endless deals every day. I use these once a week it helps so much when you are on a budget but still want a burger! 
Only thing is the angry whopper coupon came out today and I tried using it for lunch and it said it wasn‚Äôt valid in my area. Hopefully soon!

title: Worked great for awhile, now trash
review: It worked just fine for a few months and then I started getting the dreaded payment error message. Contacted support and they were no help at all. Then, to make matters worse, my login using Facebook stopped working altogether. I have the coffee subscription which I can‚Äôt use and can‚Äôt cancel. So I‚Äôm being charged monthly for nothing. Once again, support (clearly in India so useless) just kept sending me the same form response. I guess I‚Äôll have to take it up with my bank, what a PIA.

title: No update for iPhone 5's?
review:
Trying to open the app today, the message on my screen says the app needs to be updated, but when I go to the app store, there's no offer of an update, so the version I have won't open & I can't update. Hmm...
I guess I'll be going to McDonald's,  Wendy's or Sheetz down the street üòê

title: AMAZING deals
review: The deals with this app are insane. I never go here without using a coupon. I always get the $3 large fry and chicken fry or the $4 whopper jr x2 it literally comes with 2 drinks and 2 whopper jrs plus two fries for $4. This app has been so helpful, especially during COVID. Thank you Burger King!

title: Couples do not work at every Burger King only certain locations
review: Coupons and at work at every location and will use the mobile coupons you must put in a credit card or debit card I just found this out at the Burger King on Manatee and Florida the manager could not give me much information all  she said is order number comes up the customer comes in and picks it up there food orders. McDonald‚Äôs app is 100% better you can use the app at any McDonald‚Äôs

review: On at least 3 occasions, I have placed a mobile order only to arrive at the store and find out they aren‚Äôt open, don‚Äôt have staff, don‚Äôt have items, etc. it‚Äôs always something. Burger King needs to develop the app to not be available if the store isn‚Äôt going to be available. And since the app charges you as soon as you order, you end up having to go through a refund process to get money back.

And the locations where I live are not participating so I have to look at menus of burger kings that don‚Äôt even have the same food as the burger kings by my house, which is just pointless by that time.

title: Best value and quality of comparable fast food restaurants
review: Quality of the beef patties, crispy chicken is the best among all the fast food restaurants I have visited.  The seemed to be forever ongoing coupon deals also provide the best deal around.  Service is usually fast in all the Burger Kings I have been to.  No complaints at all.

title: Not worth the coupons
review: There‚Äôs been 2 times where I‚Äôve done a mobile order and haven‚Äôt received my orders due to issues at the Burger King. The employees have no access to cancel mobile orders (so they say). What‚Äôs worse is there is no way to cancel the mobile order in the app. So basically I‚Äôve just lost money using the app rather than saving. Following my frustration after these two incidents, i decided to delete my account on the BK app. Realized there is no way to delete my account in the app. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK.

title: Pretty crappy app...not user friendly!
review:
You can‚Äôt do anything until you sign in - then you need to load a credit card into the app - then you finally see coupons and make an order. Terribly awkward to download the app in store and try to order a eventually just gave up and didn‚Äôt want to waste time - NOT USER FRIENDLY!
I use my phone for everything to and I‚Äôm pretty tech savvy - this app is no good!  Stick with paper coupons or in store deals.

title: Missing features
review: This app is missing the option to add certain ingredients. For example I‚Äôm not able to add ketchup to a Texas Whopper. The only other thing that this app doesn‚Äôt have is the option to get more or less of a certain ingredient. For example light onions, extra pickles. If you could fix this it would be perfect

title: The best fast food place

The app is definitely trash.  It doesn‚Äôt let you order things correctly.  Want a whopper with extra cheese?  Nope.  Then you get to the pay side and IF it works, half the time the orders get lost in the system but you still end up paying for it.   Want to change your mind and do pick up instead?  Good luck.  9 times out of 10 the location has their inside closed.

I used to love Burger King as a kid.  Guess McDonald‚Äôs wants my business more.

title: Alert: Sign-up Failed w 2 Email Accts; Romanian Hacking?
review:
I downloaded the app (twice), each time attempted to sign up, with different email addresses.  My sign-up attempt failed both times with an error message displayed that said the email address was already in use by an existing account.  (They could not be‚ÄîI had just created both on a domain I‚Äôve solely controlled since before Internet commerce was legal.)

Thinking the app was only slightly broken, I tried (as the app suggested) to sign in with the ‚Äúexisting‚Äù email address, which failed as well both times, presenting a vague error message ‚Äúsomething went wrong.‚Äù

Oddly, in both cases, there was an immediate attempt to deliver email messages originating from IP addresses registered in Romania.

Has Burger King been hacked?

title: Limited online ordering vs. Drive Thru
review: Certain items are not on online menu,  like drinks,  you are only given a few choices to choose from vs.  Drive thru there are more options. So I tried calling the service help line no one picked up, emailed customer service it‚Äôs been 2 days no response and no refund..
I looked this problem up and apparently it‚Äôs a ongoing problem with Burger King App where users get charged but don‚Äôt get their order for various reasons . Read up on the hundreds of complains on REDDIT ..

title: Great Coupons Weird Updates
review: I love the selection of coupons on this app but I hate whenever it needs the latest update in order to use the app because sometimes I can‚Äôt update it and then I can‚Äôt use the coupons which prevents me from even going to purchase something... overall great app though.

Other than that, the app itself is better than your competitors!

title: All coupons all ways of dining.
review: Wish coupons were available for eat in, drive thru or mobile order. Not happy about certain coupons for certain ways to order.

title: Fix bugs

But upon trying to place my order it couldn‚Äôt ‚Äúretrieve prices‚Äù and my store was a participating store. I hit retry probably 30 times and it wouldn‚Äôt go through.
Also app does not include all drinks like Surge. Unsure if Surge is a participating restaurant only but more options would be nice.
If the bugs got fixed I would consider changing my rating and redownload.

title: No refunds
review: The app is not directly connected to the store. If the store has any issues, the app does not know and allows you to purchase whatever. I ordered a sandwich, got to the store, and their broiler had caught on fire earlier. I requested a refund which the direct store could not process. You then have to contact the generic BK number which must be outsourced to India bc they all seem to have that dialect. You must then wait 10 business days just to be contacted by someone locally.

title: App saves no time
review:
If I order & click ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù 10 minutes before I arrive,but I still have to get in the drive thru line behind 6 cars & wait for them to get their orders, how have I saved time????? When I tell them my order number they read it off & ask if that‚Äôs correct it‚Äôs just like not using the app to order. 
I can‚Äôt ‚Äúhave it my way‚Äù with the app because adding pickles to a sandwich is not an option if the sandwich doesn‚Äôt already have pickles.  I cannot choose fries without salt.  Do better BK.

I can choose my items and add them to my cart but when I click to check out and place the order, the screen goes blank in app. I‚Äôve restarted my phone, updated and reinstalled the app with no success. Very disappointed as this is the only way I order.

review: Funny considering there is no back button for the menu screens. They did add more customization options but took out the Apple Pay option. At least the offers are still there.

title: better than the others, still frustrating
review: Not intuitive, not clear how to go from page to page or make changes. Took too long, but much better than the competition‚Äôs site and much cheaper!

title: Can‚Äôt use Gift Cards in 2021?
review: App and offers are great, but.. Still don‚Äôt understand how on earth we can‚Äôt use a gift card in 2021 through the app. The pandemic should have made this a top priority. Have several that I can‚Äôt use since now I only order ahead via the app. Read the e-gift card numbers on the drive through lane?? No thanks..

title: Cannot ever pay in app
review: Whenever I try to order anything on the app at all it tells me there is a problem with my card and to contact my financial institution. This has happened with any of my cards. And it doesn‚Äôt matter what Burger King I choose as the pick up option. This also happens on my husbands Burger King app as well. We have logged out and back in and removed the cards and added them back, even uninstalled and reinstalled with no change. Very frustrating.
developerResponse: {'id': 18158458, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/contact-support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2020-09-28T23:02:41Z'}

title: Use the BK app at your own risk
review:
I placed an order using the BK app, but the store could find the order in their system. It was charged to my credit card and there is no way to cancel an order from the app or request a refund for an unfulfilled order.
The store made me re-order and pay again rather than just give me the items that I had proof I paid for.
I contacted BK support, but still no response after several days so I‚Äôm forced to file a claim with my credit card company to get a refund.
developerResponse: {'id': 17219728, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/contact-support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2020-08-11T18:51:25Z'}

title: Special offers not working
review: I tried ordering a family special for $25 with 2 whoppers, 2 cheese burgers, 2 chicken, 20 nuggets, plus fries and drinks for 6. But orders doesn‚Äôt go thru. So I had to do with half as much for same.  Good thing about it, in the app no major price mark up , like ordering they DoorDash directly. So no delivery fees, just a small tip for driver. Which was a great deal

title: Wouldn‚Äôt Process Any Payments
review: I tried ordering for delivery, added the items to my bag with a promo offer, went to check out, and the app wouldn‚Äôt process Apple Pay or either of my debit cards. After I closed the app and reopened it to place the same order, it got rid of my order, deleted my access to the promotions, and my end order ended up being $5 more than what it was originally. Downloaded because of an instagram ad & quickly deleting 10 minutes later
developerResponse: {'id': 16107491, 'body': 'We‚Äôre bummed to hear that you didn‚Äôt have the most ideal experience. Hit us up at BK.com/contact-support so we can look into this for you.', 'modified': '2020-06-20T06:16:49Z'}

title: Garbage
review:
Update 1:
Somehow, BK turned a 2 star app into a 1 star app. After the most recent update, the offers no longer work, my credit card was forgotten, and the login page was completely screwed up (it took 3 tries to login via the new email system and the old user/password screen was removed). To cap off a truly garbage update, the bugs below were not fixed.

**Original Review**
Not sure how this app has a 4.7 rating. Click Sides -> click any item -> click back. Instead of going back to the previous screen (Sides) it dumps you onto the main menu.

Deductions: 1 star for mediocre UX, 1 star for some painfully obvious bugs, and 1 star because those bugs have not been fixed for months.

At least it looks like they finally added Apple Pay so kudos for that.

title: Great app when it works.
review: For some reason all my credit cards are declined but only on this app. So I cannot do mobile order and I am forced to go in line like a commoner. App ordering is convenient for customer and business. A couple of my friends have same issue so it‚Äôs not just me. Saves time and can‚Äôt mess up the order as easily. Especially convenient where there is a language barrier. Please fix and make the app 5 stars!

title: App teases me..,
review:
Always get push notifications that I can order my favorite food on the app and pick it up in store or get it delivered, after almost a year of the option being in the app, it still doesn‚Äôt work. 
Take the delivery and order for pickup option off the app until it‚Äôs actually available.
Also, is it just me or is this the only food app where you can‚Äôt order anything else on the menu, except what is in the offers tab?
PS: yes I have the latest version

title: Bad customer support
review: The app crashed on me twice after completing an order and submitting payment. The local restaurant claimed that they never received the order, so I guess that should mean my debit card wasn‚Äôt charged right? Wrong!  Both charges hit my bank account immediately. I‚Äôve since contacted BK support 3 times, only to be told that my issue has been forwarded to the mobile app dept and they‚Äôll be contacting me soon about a possible refund. It‚Äôs been 7 days and I still haven‚Äôt heard from them.

title: Glitches, Can‚Äôt Even Give Feedback, Deals are Great
review:
Can‚Äôt sign in to app. Can‚Äôt even give feedback or contact help.

Signing in sends you an email link. The link in a web browser won‚Äôt activate the app (browser link to open ‚Äúin app‚Äù doesn‚Äôt work).

Trying to give feedback through app requires you to have an installed email app from a list. Sorry, I don‚Äôt have one on the list. I use a different email app. Selecting ‚Äúother‚Äù for what email I use tries to sign me up for an account on a completely white page with no description, which doesn‚Äôt make sense.

Going to the App Store to select ‚Äúapp support‚Äù redirects me to a broken link inside the app (location not found error).

Coupons are good. Just can‚Äôt use mobile orders.

title: Email doesn't work
review: I have an account with burger king and the new email feature doesn't work. I have tried 7 plus times to have the app send a link to my email, but I don't receive anything. I even uninstalled and reinstalled the app only getting an updating pop-up. Then I thought, oh that's why! But sadly, it still didn't work. I even tried different emails, but the app still didnt send the link. I just want my food man lol

title: UnIntuitive sign in method
review: What good reason for you guys to change the sign in method to email? Some of us still prefer to use password because it‚Äôs, fortunately, faster and more intuitive than an email! Please add the option in the account setting of the app to allow user to revert back to password method over an email.

title: 2 orders both bad experiences
review: I‚Äôve placed two orders using the app. When I got up to the window for the first one I was told that they couldn‚Äôt fill my order because they didn‚Äôt have whopper meat they also couldn‚Äôt refund my order because that was processed through corporate and they didn‚Äôt get the money for it. The second one at a different location was a drive-through order and I was told the restaurant does not do mobile orders at the drive-through and that I had to come inside.

title: Wasted Potential = 0 Stars
review:
It‚Äôs true there are exclusive coupons only redeemable online through the app.

But what they don‚Äôt tell you is if you are a daily customer they will flag your credit card and not allow you to use it online, so you can‚Äôt get those deals. 

I‚Äôve emailed the mobile team,  who said my card was flagged as fraud and it should return to normal if no issues are found.

Well, no issues were found but the case remains open. This was 45 days ago. The corporate number provides no assistance. They say mobile needs to deal with it.

Mobile repeatedly misunderstands my requests. My problem will never get fixed until support fixes the broken parameters.

This brought the convenience of the app from 4-5 stars to 0.

BK, contact me or lose a daily customer.

title: App is terrible
review: It keeps telling you to change your payment method and when you add an additional good credit card it either. This is either a flaw in the app or a way each individual location can reject the mobile order specials the app offers. The app seems to except payment for normal priced items but says it can‚Äôt except your payment method on mobile only orders or sometimes it will say The pricing can‚Äôt be confirmed and reject mobile order specials. Please fix this!!

title: Love the app
review: I love this app because it makes it so much easier than asking the kids what they want then telling the drive thu. I can ask them and they can pick what they want without being rushed. I will it allowed for you to app more on sandwiches like extra pickles or the big king sauce.

title: Menu
review: I‚Äôve found that French toast sticks are not given as an option in the app, even though the store does carry them. I lose out on points as a result since I can‚Äôt order them through the BK app

title: Worthless
review: Will not let me log in, when I requested a password change pin, it told me my email was not valid. Of course my email is valid! Uninstalled, reinstalled, this app just won‚Äôt let me log in. They offer these great coupons but you can‚Äôt use them!  Guess I‚Äôm lucky I never got very far with this app though.  Read the reviews...mobile orders require a credit card and numerous reviews of cards being compromised. Beware if you manage to get past the log in. Not worth the hassle and risk.

title: Used to be good but now it‚Äôs too complicated
review: I used to use the Burger King app all the time especially with their coupons but now the only way to use the coupons is if you pay through the app requiring you to use a card. I don‚Äôt always pay with my card and I won‚Äôt save my debit card to their app so the app is now useless to me. Used to be a good app to use but using a card to pay ahead should be optional not required.

title: Completely useless!
review: Mobile ordering not available in our area apparently. Why wouldn‚Äôt this be available at any location? What‚Äôs the point of the app? We have five BKs in our town and none of the use mobile ordering. I tried to at least use the coupons but that was a fail too. I tried to log in using my Facebook account and it won‚Äôt go through. Never had that problem before. The app is a complete fail and useless! If I could give it zero stars, I would.

title: Stupid app - charged when BK wasn't even open!
review:
This is NOT A SMART APP - I placed an order on Christmas, arrived 5 minutes later to find the BK branch was not even open! BWhy is your app so poorly designed so it doesn't even know which branch is open or closed at the time an order is placed?!  Now I have to dispute the charge with my credit card!

Last month, I placed an order using one of the apps coupons. The stupid app CHARGED my credit card, then tells me the coupon is not valid or some sort of error and didn't generate an order pick up number for me. But I still got charged!  Then I had to waste time disputing the charge with my credit card.

I've used the McDonald's app even more often than I used the BK app, and such errors have yet to happen on McDonald's app!

PLEASE HIRE better programmers to do your app.

title: Gr8 deals!
review: $1 your way deals are a cost effective wat to get a great deal and keep the kids happy without breaking the bank these days‚Ä¶ and compliment it with a BK Offer of the day and you‚Äôll feed a family of 3 adults for u see $10.! CRAZY!!!

title: Poor app
review: App doesn‚Äôt tell us if we can go inside or need to use drive thru. I order to go inside but when I get there only the drive thru is open. So my order was placed and getting prepared, but since I have to use drive thru it is cold by the time I get there. Once they microwaved my sandwich which made it blistering hot. I have stopped going to BK because of this issue. BK is my favorite sandwich but am forced to go to mcdonalds now. Bad app and worse customer service

review:

Please keep Whopper Wednesday forever!

title: Inaccurate coupons.
review: The only reason I ordered from Burger King was for there coupons. Now there coupons are less diverse and are not EVEN INACCURATE! A coupon clearly show and say soft drinks but when you try to customize your order it only shows coffee. I don‚Äôt drink coffee so I‚Äôm not gonna pay for something I don‚Äôt drink. Awful app now, awful rebranding. Also, how come you can‚Äôt get the same coupon as the ones that are mailed to you on the app?

title: What‚Äôs going on?
review:
I used the drive-up window on 8-2-21 at 6:35 pm in Poteau, OK. Noticed NO EMPLOYEE wearing masks OR gloves.  I felt like I was being too paranoid, so I ignored it. I took my purchase home and ate it, it was fine. About 4 am my stomach started gurgling and shortly after I had stomach discomfort. I BELIEVE I have had some food poisoning, not intentionally, but I still do! 
I have attempted to reach out to that store, however, the phone is CONTINUOUSLY busy! ALL DAY! No point in having a phone there if customers can‚Äôt call!

title: Please fix!!
review: Burger King App is well done. But I took off a star due to the fact that on meals there is a limit to what you can choose for drinks on different sized meals. Please fix. I‚Äôd like to be able to order the tea on a small meal instead of having to choose a medium meal to get the tea option.

title: Yum
review: First, we like the menu variety. Then, we like that there are many orders from which to choose. We also like that any alterations we need, such as no salt fries, are always accomodated. Thank you, Burger King~ in so many locations as we travel‚ù£Ô∏è

title: Wow!
review: I‚Äôm very impressed with the app. It is easy to go through you could even make custom orders for things that you don‚Äôt want on your sandwich is or add things that you do want on your sandwich. Way to go Burger King for making it our way!

title: Will not complete orders
review: Since new update I cannot complete an order on Mobil app! Before this app was great and easy. Now orders can‚Äôt be completed. Why try to fix something that isn‚Äôt broke. Yes I deleted app and reinstalled with no change!

title: App doesn‚Äôt work
review:
Giving 1 star but want to give zero. Just downloaded app, starving, wanted to save on delivery so I downloaded app instead of using third party delivery. 
Every icon I click when trying to order food takes me to a blank page. Very frustrating. The only one that works? Favorites, when you click on it, it says shakes, click that, blank page.

review: Theres no harm in trying, at least you tried. You will never find out until you do it yourself. Grab your phone, download the mobile app and enjoy each perks after perks. What are you waiting. Dont you want a free burger?

title: The worst app I've ever encountered
review: I don't say that lightly. I've tried about ten different times, over different days, even using different cards in Apple Pay to do an order for pickup and it has NEVER gone through. I'm constantly charged and credited with an error message popping on my screen. If ordering for pickup or on the app is not available for my area just don't have it as an option. Every time I have a craving for this and it doesn't work I just don't bother with Burger King at all.

title: Fix now
review: I‚Äôm trying to order with the offer deal and then added stuff when I went to do mobile delivery order it said having problems unable to connect to restaurant try a different location price might change I was very upset they need to fix this now

title: Best app of all
review: This is the easiest app, has more offers than any other restaurants!! On top of all of the great offers, the Butger King on Republic Rd and Kansas Expressway in Springfield, Missouri is always friendly, efficient. I will drive out of my way to  go to this location for the excellent service and food!!!

title: Link provided will not open app
review:
Updated as required, cannot order. T mobile banner also missing.  It is MUCH harder to use app now.
I cannot find alternative method to log in. 
Lost a customer.

title: Extremely glitchy
review:
Switches what I‚Äôm trying to order constantly. Resets any modifications and changes to meal even though I‚Äôve clicked entree. Pressing back goes to the top of the menu instead of the category I was in why? Light or extra tomato is free but normal amount of tomato is .12? And after all that none of the restaurants are accepting orders / reachable anyway.

Online menu has the same issues too. This has been a waste of 45 minutes. Absolutely useless app and online ordering experience.

title: Offer Refresh
review: Bk has some good deals on the offers page, but you better look at them quickly because the page refreshes every minute, and returns to the top. title: Garbage app
review:
Where to start?
1. I open the app and have to sit there while it downloads an update. 
2. Building a small meal kept resetting it to a medium size. I had to build it 3 times before I could do it fast enough to keep it small. 
3. None of the input fields work with iOS. No auto-fill of my name, address, card info, etc. 
4. Apple Pay failed every time. No matter which card I used. Had to add a credit card manually. Which sucked because of the aforementioned unsupported input fields.
