title: New Update is awful
review: This app would normally be 5 stars but this update completely broke it. I can‚Äôt even sign in!! Give me the option of making a password instead of sending an email link that doesn‚Äôt work with the app!

title: Updated version is 10/10
review: Best mobile food ordering app out there. Makes it too easy to order food end up going here too much now. The updated version actually works now no issue with credit card. üëçüëç

title: Easy for the family
review: I do like this app. We use it when we need fast food in our area and it‚Äôs super nice and convenient. I would say the only issue is that you are limited in asking for extras. If we wanted say dbl cheese or some such it has no options for this.

title: Have it your way?
review: Not a lot of options to customize your food, you can subtract condiments but not add things like mustard or even premium items that would give them an upcharge.  They have a ways to go to catch up to McDonalds and Chick-fil-a apps.  And rheir slogan is have it your way

title: Payment issues
review: App was working perfectly fine when I first downloaded it. But lately every time when it comes to payment, the payment is always declined. I‚Äôve check all the info and it makes current and correct. Still didn‚Äôt work. Erased the app and downloaded the app again with all the correct credit card info and still gets denied. I got annoyed and decided to delete the app entirely.

title: Updates cause me to not use it on the fly
review: I eat here once a month. Maybe twice a month. Each time I‚Äôve tried to use the app, it requires an update and I cannot order the deals. I have to wait for it to update. And I‚Äôm not going to hold up the drive thru line. So yeah, here I am paying full price today. Because yet again there is an update and I am unable to use the app.

title: Missing cart tab???
review: Used the app countless times with no problems, tried it today and cannot find the cart tab, did something change?

title: Good if they participate
review: I have used this app across the country and it does save money if you have locations that take the mobile orders to use the best coupons. Rochester NY for example only has one location use the mobile only coupons and it‚Äôs in a mall. Not easy to access. When I lived in Rogers Arkansas it worked very well as each location accepted the coupons.

title: Customizing orders isn‚Äôt working
review: I have been trying the last few days to order on here, I would be able to choose the coupon I was wanting, but it won‚Äôt let me customize any food items every time I try to click on customize nothing happens. Besides that the app is great

title: The king of Burgers (fast food)
review: I didn‚Äôt always like Burger King at least the one in my old town, but now it‚Äôs my go to fast food burger chain. The app is great and offers great deals like the $5 whopper meal and $3 Double Whopper! Great app and interface is nice as well

title: Rewards
review: I didn‚Äôt know that I had to tell the cashier in the drive thru while ordering that I had a coupon they acted like it was a big deal at the window. It took so long for them to fix it that my fries had got cold and my milkshake was almost completely melted

title: Terrific offers!
review: The Burger King app has the best coupons, although it is frustrating that some outlets don‚Äôt honor some coupons, but make you click on them before they telll you.  So the coupon disappears unredeemed

title: Can‚Äôt use app, frozen setting up perks, can‚Äôt contact support
review: Every time I try to use the app, I agree to the rewards and I get stuck waiting to set up Royal Perks. Have tried several times, keeping the open for hours, never completes the configuration. When I go to Contact Us on the Apple Store, it opens the app and it takes me to the app where I need to configure Royal Perks to do anything. Looks like there is no error handling for time outs around configurations.

title: The King for a reason
review: Why can‚Äôt any other fast food apps use Apple Pay? BK earns my business out of straight convenience. App is good. Used to crash like crazy, but they‚Äôve figured out whatever bug was going on.

title: Staff
review: When I order through the mobile app I still expect to get hot food. I always have to ask it be cooked fresh and then I get nothing but attitude from the staff. review:
1. Every time I open the app it ask if I want to make it official and link my Facebook account.

review:
I have all the local fast food apps and so far BK has been the most reliable.

title: Thank you.
review: First off, great staff, quick order timing and of course, Thank you BK for putting kids meal free! It gives me a little piece of mind that I don‚Äôt have to treat my 3yr old and 6year old to great food on a slim to none budget with my struggle on money and my job. I heart y‚Äôall!!!

review:
I love  BK but they can learn a lot from McDonalds app.   -No curbside pickup option ??   No ability to modify combos or early make a complete out of a single item??    The deals are good and would like to see more.  The new Rewards system is good .

title: Rudeness
review: I love Burger King but this location in Seffner has a Spanish short female employee that is always nasty and rude with customers. Orders are not accurate. title: Great for coupons but...
review: You can find some great deals on the app but the most frustrating thing happens that the order can not be completed. This has happened on multiple occasions and it is increasingly frustrating. Fix this bug if you really want people to comply with online ordering during the COVID pandemic.

title: Fast food slow app
review: As I fumble through the beautiful meals and deals of this application, my morning couldn‚Äôt help but be absolutely destroyed by the fact that my roommates wanted to get BK. Being the savvy consumer I am, I went to this buggy and redundant app. I had to delete the app and re-download it immediately just to see the menu. title: Not a good app
review: Whenever I put either a certain amount of food in or reach a certain dollar amount (not sure which), the app bugs out and won‚Äôt continue. I have to start from scratch and whenever I hit that invisible threshold it does it all over again. Super irritating and not conducive to doing business if your customers can‚Äôt order.

title: After update, unusable
review:
I went to go use the app tonight, and it downloaded an update. I went to go make an order and things did not go well. I had nearly completed my order 3 times, and the app said it no longer could communicate with the store, and the only option it gave me was to start over . 

My other apps were working fine and reception at its highest level, so definitely wasn‚Äôt a connection issue.

Design of the cart should never contact the restaurant until the order is ready to be fulfilled, except for initial menu load. I am a software engineer, and have no clue why it was designed this way, but it leads to more issues if you have to communicate with the store for every cart view.

I ended up giving up on using the app to place an order.

title: Screwed up app
review: For the past three months I still can‚Äôt get in on my app due to the three dots theory! I reset, turned on the location as they recommended, still no response/the three dots theory! Maybe it‚Äôs the update which the matter is worse! A disgrace and ashamed!

title: Passwords are so last Year??... Ever tried App developerment??
review: Once the app update removed need for passwords, I have no point of using this app as it sends a verification link and hat cannot launch and verify in the app. BK no one should be eating your food but when they choose to it shouldn‚Äôt require 10 steps to redeem something as simple as a coupon. Nothing is perfect but McDonald‚Äôs, Sonic, and Hardee‚Äôs/Carl‚Äôs JR got a development team that can figure this stuff out and they are competition, so try competing rather than stand out as a P.I.T.A.

title: If I could rate 0 stars I would
review: This absolute piece of trash app does not allow order modifications or cancellations once you hit submit. They instantly bill your card. I submitted an order for the wrong location and at the suggestion of the manager pushed a new order through because they said I could cancel the old one. No way to cancel and no way to get a refund. Multiple attempts to contact support and the only response I have gotten is a canned ‚Äúsorry about your luck‚Äù email.

title: Blah new update
review: I loved the BK app and use it a lot. However after the new update it will not sign me in. I follow all prompts to get signed in but it logs me in through the email and will not actually sign me in to the app. Wish we could use passwords like we did previously. This new update is not a great one.

title: Love it!!
review: Easy to use, and I LOVE mobile ordering!! I‚Äôll admit, the 4 stars are because my order isn‚Äôt usually 100% correct when mobile ordering. Not sure if that‚Äôs an app or store issue. Also, thought the Stranger King‚Äôs event was pretty cool. You should do stuff like that more often!

title: Thanks for basically the free whopper!
review: The app is so convenient. I can order somewhere else on the app and then pick up my order through the drive thru instead of getting my order messed up trying to communicate with the workers there. Thanks a lot!

title: App is NOT secure!  Fraudulent charges!
review: This app is NOT secure!  I would give ZERO stars if possible!   I found three fraudulent charges today when I was reviewing my order history in the app.  These charges totaled nearly $100.  I called my credit card company and put the three charges into dispute.  Check your order history and be sure to review your credit card statement as well!  My phone has never been out of my possession and the store number listed on the orders is not even a store I have ever visited.

title: Doesn‚Äôt support Apple Pay
review:
Only major fast food place that supports Apple Pay in stores but not in their app. Need to update the online payment allowed to current standards allowed in stores. 

Would also be nice to be able to order in app and customize. Always order off broiler here to make sure the food isn‚Äôt precooked and the app doesn‚Äôt allow for that.

title: Fraudulent transactions
review:
DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! Would give it 0 stars if I could. Not worth the risk. 

My debit card information was stolen from my account, and I had over $400 taken from my account over the span of a month (only to buy Burger King). When I contacted customer service they sent a generic reply that told me to delete my card from the account. 

How unprofessional do you have to be to not even offer an apology or try to make amends? Nobody ever contacted me about this when I placed two requests with customer service.

title: Hit or miss
review: Second time I had an issue. Tried to unlock the ‚Äúdetour‚Äù coupon. App said it was unlocked, I ordered through the app, added a drink but when I picked it up it said I only had a drink. I couldn‚Äôt pull the coupon back up and wasted 15 mins in line. Other time it wouldn‚Äôt run my payment despite my card on file working fine elsewhere. Could learn some things about order customization UI from Chick-fil-a app including adding extra veggies and ordering multiples if the same  item.

title: Getting better
review: When the app first came out I found it to be really irritating. Now are use it a lot. Glitches are way down and I can send my kids to pick up the food!

title: Be careful
review: I tried to use the app the purchase the .1 cent whopper, I logged in through my Facebook account and once I did it had someone else‚Äôs credit card linked to my account. Good thing I couldn‚Äôt see their account info except last 4 of card number, but I still could have ordered anything I wanted under their card. Luckily for that person I am an honest individual so I logged out and removed the card. So there is clearly some security issues between fb and Burger King here.

title: Bad move BK
review: Used to be a great app because they included all of their printed coupons on their app so I didn‚Äôt have to carry around a circular.  I made the mistake of updating it for ‚Äònew and improved‚Äô and instead they had removed 3/4 of their deals.  Not a single breakfast offer!! Boo!!!  Save a tree BK and keep your coupons accessible on your app!!

title: Late food delievry
review: I recently made an order with BK and literally an hour later my food was no were to be seen, even though the person delivering said the food was delivered. I tried to dispute the order with BK so that could reorder my food, but BK just kept saying that my order was on the way and they didn‚Äôt do anything about it. So I lost my money and didn‚Äôt get my food. Great service.

review: While I like the customization I can do with my orders in this app, I was stunned to see how much data it uses. It takes a long time for the app to find nearby locations, meanwhile it is burning through data.

title: Lunch for 2, the price not blue.
review:
My wife & I stay 104 miles away from home, due to my work.  We‚Äôve learned how to save money from time to time.  

The Whopper Jr., meal for 2 is a bargain, using Burger King phone app.  Makes for a nice memory being made, as we share a quality Jr. burger together. 

Thank you Burger King & associates.

title: Better Deals than their competitors!
review: The deals offered on this app are awesome! The quality of BK‚Äôs products have always been great but with the offers that they have been great for my family! I have stopped going to the other places and made BK my go to spot!

title: Improved dramatically from a year ago
review: App has definitely improved significanty in the past year. Good job taking feedback, running with it, and drastically improving user experience.

title: This app doesn‚Äôt work

title: took money but no food order
review:
I downloaded the app to enjoy a free Whopper offer which also required a minimal add on purchase.  After sharing all my info (twice)  ...  three dots flashed for a minute but no confirmation.  (Yes I had wifi and cell service.)

I ended up going into the restaurant and they said there is no record of my order. They had me check the ‚Äúreorder button‚Äù on the app and there was nothing there.  I then spent 20 more minutes calling my bank to learn I was charged. üëçüèªgreat. 

So BK has it their way with a Whopper of a deal!  
I paid, gave up my personal info and in return ...

No order, no food, no free sandwich, and no iced coffee.  

Thanks For wasting my time (an hour+) and taking my money. 

folks - Just drive thru and pay - a total hassle all the way around.

title: No gift cards
review: To be honest I‚Äôm not really sure how I should rate this app because the reason I downloaded this app was to use some gift cards. The app appears to look good enough for it‚Äôs purposes but unfortunately you can not use gift cards as far as I can see. I would like to suggest adding a way to make it possible for people to use gift cards for purchases.

title: Broken ordering that gets mad when you use too many deals
review:
When using the deals or bundles in the app, if you add too many, the app tells you it can‚Äôt connect to store when trying to check your cart. Only remedy is to clear your cart. 

Tried it with two phones side by side, and you can add $30 of regular items and it works fine, but swap 2 items for bundles at the same price, and it suddenly can‚Äôt connect. 

Same issue on both phones when trying to reverse the roles. It‚Äôs a scam to make you stop getting the discounted prices.

Note: the app allows you to use multiple bundles and says nowhere that you can‚Äôt. It just acts like there‚Äôs a connection issue when there‚Äôs clearly not

title: NEVER AGAIN!!!
review: Waste of time and money. I have used this service 3 times and every time, I did not get a complete order. Up until tonight, I have just let it go. So the $3.99 for the delivery fee, the missing 2 drinks, and a tip for the driver right now is a small fortune. I feel totally ripped off. This is the last time I will have food delivered from BK!!!

title: Horrible
review: This app is one of the worst apps for restraints. There is no real time. Delivery or anything. You can‚Äôt contact the courier, it says number is no longer available. The upgrade for this app are the worst. I love Burger King. I will not be using your app any longer. I will just pick up or order through Uber eats or something next time. At least I can talk to my courier and make sure there are no issues. It took over an hour to get my food. Ridiculous. The wait time was very inaccurate.

title: Can‚Äôt create an account nor sign in

title: Can‚Äôt see your order after placing it!
review: After placing an order, there is no where to see your order until after you pick it up. The order only shows up in the reorder tab (not intuitive) after you pick it up. Also, you have to close and reopen the app a few times to see it. Refreshing the reorder screen does not even work. I contacted their app team, they were unhelpful. I had to restart the app a few times to finally see my receipt.

title: Love the food but the worst app of all fast food apps
review:
First of all every time I use the app like once a week I‚Äôm forced to download an update which automatically detracts from any convenience.  Then every time I dload an update there is an update there is a new glitch.  Let‚Äôs me spend 5 minutes putting my order together  all the way to ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù then is always ‚Äúunable to process my order‚Äù.  Never have this problem
With McDonald‚Äôs app or other apps I use.  I hate having my time wasted!!!

title: Can‚Äôt have it my way
review:
Have it your way???   For real?  For over 40 years I have ordered my whopper with extra, extra pickles and now this stupid app will only let me choose ‚Äúas is‚Äù or none.  What idiot did not anticipate customers would request heavy toppings.   So the app is basically worthless till this is fixed. 
Also, whopper coupons should now let you choose a beef whopper or an impossible whopper, it of course not.  The poor king loses a sale every time these options fail.

title: Lovin‚Äô BK All the Way
review:
I am a frequent customer at BK in Mount Holly on High Street.  I just can‚Äôt say enough about the quality of the food, the excellent service and my overall satisfaction.  I guess that says it: at BK I feel like a king ‚Äòcause I rule.
Sincerely,
A very happy customer‚Ä¶

title: Pray you never need support
review: The app is fine as long as you never need support.  Both my spouse and I had the BK Cafe subscription and it was suddenly removed. When we tried to resubscribe, we get a ‚ÄúCannot process your subscription at this time‚Äù error.  The only support for this app is an email system: and the best advice they could offer was to wait and see if the issue would resolve itself.  That was over a month ago.  Worst customer support I‚Äôve received from a company in years.

title: Zero star review
review: Download app to take advantage of the 1¬¢ but like thousands of others I was told no Burger King in 10 miles accepts mobile orders. When I went to the store the cashier checked my app to verify I was at McDonald‚Äôs and told me they would honor the deal only if I made an additional purchase. When I reached out to corporate I was told they would pass it along and offered me nothing for my troubles. I will no longer be visiting any Burger King in future. 0/5 stars for the app and 0/5 stars for customer service.

title: Can‚Äôt get coupons or log into account
review: Ever since the new update I can‚Äôt sign into my account or even create a new one...it keeps saying error...I‚Äôve tried a number of things to resolve this issue but nothing seems to work. Sorry to say but I won‚Äôt be buying any Burger King until this issue is resolved because the coupons actually save you a lot of money compared to buying right off the menu.

title: Love the app!
review: I love that my order is ready when I get there using the app. It also makes it harder for them to screw up my order because I always have the burgers made the way I like it.

title: Too many updates
review: I would be giving a much better review if it were not for having to update, yet again, from the parking lot. Seems like it‚Äôs nearly every time I come! If the prices hadn‚Äôt gone up so much, I wouldn‚Äôt worry about the specials, but now they make a huge difference. They sure do make you jump through hoops to get them, though.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work
review: App used to work all the time and worked well. Now I moved away from my BK but I was back today and tried to use it but it‚Äôs unusable. If you add a meal with two burgers you can‚Äôt customize them. You change one then go to the other and customize it but then you lose the customizations you made to the first one. Also it only lets you choose soft drinks with the meal, I wanted tea but that wasn‚Äôt on there this time. They need to go back to the way it used to be.

title: It almost never works
review:
When it works, 5 stars. However the amount of issues I have drops it to 1 star. Most of the time it won‚Äôt connect to the internet. It won‚Äôt let me submit my cards. Won‚Äôt stay logged in. Causes my bank to flag my card as having fraudulent activity. So honestly? Don‚Äôt bother. 

Spent ten minutes trying to get an order submitted. The menu options wouldn‚Äôt kow but the deals did. Then it wouldn‚Äôt let me submit the order. Seriously. Not worth the headache

title: New Burger King app stinks!
review:
I have run into a number of issues with the new Burger King mobile app:

1. There are several offers that include two small fries. In some of them, it‚Äôs possible to swap one small fries with one small onion rings, but in others it‚Äôs not possible. For example, the offer for two original chicken sandwiches and two small fries. This offer had a swap option in the old version of the app but it‚Äôs absent from the new version. Please fix this.

2. When I add an offer to my cart, there is no way to edit it/customize it afterwards.  I have to completely remove it and start over.

3. There is no way to customize the amount of ice in beverages, for example if I want no ice or light ice. Please add this option. Other similar mobile apps have this option.

title: No more passwords means...
review:
No more passwords means I can‚Äôt get logged into the app! And when I contacted costumer support, I got a message about how to retrieve my PASSWORD!?! Oh, and a link to app support that‚Äôs a 404 message...

Anyway, after going through the process of requesting access to my account, and getting the email and tapping sign in and the tapping open the app ... I get the message ‚ÄúSafari cannot open the page because it cannot redirect to locations starting with ‚Äòburgerking:‚Äô.‚Äù

I‚Äôd love to use the app. But this is jut goofy.

title: What a way to ruin an app!
review: Whose idea was it to change from native iOS controls to a web view? The previous versions of the app were slick, and most importantly, they were fast! This version is slow ‚Äî you can literally watch things as they crawl their way to the screen.  If I wanted the BK web site, I‚Äôd go to it in safari ‚Äî I don‚Äôt need an app!  Please please, bring the old app back, otherwise I‚Äôll have to use the McDonald‚Äôs app more often ‚Äî it at least loads and renders much faster!

title: Great when it works
review: They have great coupons and I love their whoppers and the app is super easy WHEN IT WORKS! Literally every other time I try to use it it cannot process payment, neither Apple Pay or adding a credit card. And when I ask inside they say yep we‚Äôve heard that sorry. They can‚Äôt do anything about it, so not there fault. But please fix the pay glitch!

title: Was great the first few times then it broke
review: I used this four or five times with no issues. Now whenever I use it, no matter which Burger King I stop at, it ultimately sticks on the ‚Äúunable to process your payment at this time‚Äù error. I have tried deleting and reinstalling, and even different credit cards ‚Äî although it likely isn‚Äôt related to anything with those (credit cards all work fine on competitors apps). May give it one final shot then deleting it for good.

title: Can‚Äôt customize order
review: When I try to customize an order I am not able to go to the next screen it just stays on the same page. This is frustrating as I would like to remove things on my order. For example, removing tomatoes and pickles from the whopper.

title: So cheap!
review: I ordered a $8 dollar sandwich, 2 salads for $14, and I looked in my rewards and I got another $8 sandwich for free! And then I looked for a coupon and there was a deal which would take $5 dollars off my order, so I only paid $22 dollars it‚Äôs amazing!

I understand things happen but I can‚Äôt find the correct place in the app to request a refund.  I actually don‚Äôt feel I should have to but nevertheless‚Ä¶‚Ä¶here I am??? Any help would be greatly appreciated.

In addition to the loss of drink options, the payment portion recently stopped working. Now, I have to remove my card and add it again every time I order. Apple Pay also no longer works.

review:
New update did the following:
Why would you remove APPLE PAY?! Do you know how many customers you will lose by doing this!
Unable to review the total order before app places the order. For example, they replaced ‚Äúorder‚Äù with ‚Äúcontinue.‚Äù
Unable to review coupons anymore.
There is no cancel order option so dont make a mistake. You will get an emailed receipt with tell us what you think or cancel an order? Yea pressing 1 or 2 options doesnt work. The line goes dead. Only english or spanish option seems to work. 
The capacity of the app to handle increased traffic due to tmobile is heavily reduced on Tuesday. It will slow down significantly.
McD app is much better

title: Something is seriously wrong
review: There is something seriously wrong with this update. It glitches, takes you to other pages and then bounces you back, but not in the same place you were. And then when you try to use certain features it tells you you need to sign in to use it, but wait, you can‚Äôt sign in because passwords are so ‚Äúyesterday‚Äù. Get your act together people!

title: Stupid
review: First getting rid of passwords isn‚Äôt a good idea and it made my morning much more difficult and time consuming. Then I see that all of the deals I had on the previous version are GONE, there‚Äôs no reason to use this app anymore if there aren‚Äôt any good deals available which further screwed up my morning and I ended up going elsewhere. If you have the old version DON‚ÄôT update endless you want a terrible, useless app. Luckily my wife still has the old version.

title: What are you doing Burger King?
review: Sigh once again you have changed your app offers and reduced the amount of coupons previously given. No more 8.99 2 whopper 2 small fries and 2 small drinks meals now? They try to make me pay at the window when it already took the payment on my card, they lose the order, and I‚Äôve been charged twice for a single purchase.... two separate times. And to make it MORE inconvenient, every time there is an update it FORCES you to download it. I don‚Äôt have that much space. That‚Äôs enough to steer me away from eating here.

title: Suggestions

I walked right out the store and across the street to mcdonalds and ate there since their app works and they care about their customer. i also don‚Äôt think a mcdonalds employee would ever suggest that a cusomter was lying about a NATIONAL promotion to them.

review: This is great and an awesome way to order food, but the ap says to go to the drive through, but when I get to the store, they tell me I have to come inside. The whole reason for me coming out is to not get out my car, but that‚Äôs just my opinion.

review: I never eat at BK without looking on the app to see if there‚Äôs a good deal, (and there always is!) In fact, I think the BK app offers the best coupons and deals out if any of the other fast food apps I use!

review: It has happen to me 2 time where i place my order then it ask to confirm the location and it changed it to florida when i had chosen the closest location on the map in California so not sure if there is a glitch or just something that happens to me

title: Completely unreliable
review:
This app rarely works correctly. Restaurants randomly participate and then unparticipate with mobile orders. If you try to use Apple Pay you‚Äôll get a ‚Äúsomething went wrong‚Äù error. And the wonderful T-Mobile Tuesday free/cheap Whopper deals can rarely actually be redeemed ‚Äî the button which is meant to allow redemption has its link removed. As an end user it‚Äôs seemingly to prevent too many people from actually redeeming the offers. 

Get your act together please.

title: Needs big time improvements
review: This app has great coupons/deals, but it‚Äôs such a long process to place your order. The app is always updating which takes a long time, and the login process makes you use an email link each time. On top of that, majority of the time it gives me an error message when I try to pay for my order. They need to make serious improvements to this and give customers a user-friendly app.

title: Do not change, only improve!
review: Recently deleted the McDonald‚Äôs app due to their update removing multiple deals. Left with about 5 deals a day. Always loved the King, now I live in the castle. Don‚Äôt change it.. this should be music to your ears. Signed, forever yours, American boy.

title: No help from customer support
review: They refuse to refund my order that was delivered to the wrong address, I get the runaround from customer support from even third party they use and have. Not trustable or dependable, biggest waste of money and the customer support never even tried to fix the problem they just said to talk to someone else. The number on their app to get help doesn‚Äôt even offer help, the chat people tell me there is nothing they can do and to call someone else.

title: Offers Unsure
review: At first the app seemed to work great and at the very last step, it states the deal is no longer available yet it‚Äôs offered on the very beginning screen. During the subsequent order, I kept seeing how the order was being processed but as a delivery it was under $10. How confusing!!! Even as I write this review, the lettering is white against a white screen! #SMDH

title: Fix login on app
review: Every time I want to use this app, I go through a long trial and error just to login. I type in my email, and it sends a link to my email for me to click on, but when clicking to open app in email, the app doesn‚Äôt open. I‚Äôm missing deals just because of it.

title: BUYER BEWARE!!
review:
Once, I placed my order, arrived at the restaurant, pulled in the door handle and it was locked. The manager haven‚Äôt bother to open. 

On another occasion, when I arrived, the restaurant had not received my order.  They told me I had probably selected the wrong location,  and continued this explanation after I showed it to them in my order history.  

In these situations, you‚Äôre on your own. You can‚Äôt get a refund through the app. You‚Äôre told to have the restaurant correct the problem or dispute it with your bank. The restaurant can‚Äôt fix it if they aren‚Äôt open, and if they refuse to admit the mistake wasn‚Äôt your, do you really think they‚Äôre going to give you a refund?  I won‚Äôt keep going by the bank to dispute $4 debits. I just won‚Äôt use this app any more. 

GOOD LUCK!

title: Burger King app needs major enhancement
review: Error every time I go to checkout.  No option for a quantity increase.  Have to repeat the process for ordering the same thing that you just added to the cart.  After you‚Äôre done doing that and you go to check out, you get the error, can‚Äôt get total or something along those lines.  Can‚Äôt get past this part to checkout.  Uninstalled/reinstalled app, restarted phone, still the same error.  Needs a major enhancement.

title: Not easy to customize your toppings
review: For Burger King, you would think being able to customize your toppings would be easy on their app, considering that has been their selling point for decades. It is not. You are only allowed to either add or subtract an ingredient. No ability to indicate you want extra of something. Top it off with half the time the app doesn‚Äôt load the total of the cart, and I just find myself ordering from another fast food place.

title: Best deals period
review: Thanks to Burger King for always having the best deals that will save you a couple of dollars that comes in handy especially during these difficult  times thanks.

title: Menu? Really$
review: Ok, so I‚Äôm going to church at 10 am. I want to see the all day menu to determine what I want for lunch to order ahead for pickup. The app will not allow me to even SEE that menu, but only allows me to see the breakfast menu. If I click on the all day menu I get a response that it is still breakfast time.

title: APP NEVER WORKS
review: This app actually functions properly 10% of the time. I will waste time filling the cart for a family of five...then be told at checkout ‚Äúrestaurant unavailable‚Äù and be kicked back to the main menu. This issue has NOTHING to do with the location selected, as I‚Äôve tried SEVERAL. Even out of state locations, just to test the issue. BK had lost a LOT of my larger family‚Äôs business due to this crappy mobile app.

title: App is completely useless after updates
review:

I was utilizing BK since the McD‚Äôs next door is being remodeled but not with this app amdthe unusually long wait times.

title: Awesome

title: Horrible app

title: Why only two Coke options?
review: So, the restaurant actually offers Coke Zero, and other options. But, the App only lets me select Coke or Diet Coke...kinda lame, if you ask me. Would it REALLY be that difficult to include the other options? (Yes, I know that not ALL locations offer Coke Zero...but, still can‚Äôt be that difficult to update the app accordingly).

title: Best Fast Food App Period
review: Title says it all. Better deals than any other fast food app out there that I‚Äôve tried. Wish they had some kind of loyalty rewards program but I‚Äôll live without it.

title: Menu
review: The app is pretty nice and easy to order but I wish you could edit a item in checkout instead of deleting the item and starting all over to add to cart. Other then that love the deals that are app exclusive only!

title: Burger King
review:
Dear Burger King thanks for all the good work  you put into the food and thanks to all the workers that is kind and caring thanks for everything you ladies and gentlemen for all the hard work you guys do for everyone 

                             Thank you 
           Sincerely Jose Lopez

title: Three bad orders in a row.
review:
I love BK. Unfortunately every time I use the app they mess up my order.  This has happen three times in a row. Sad that I will not order using the app ever again.  Great concept but it‚Äôs too expensive, takes way too long and is apparently very inconsistent. My last order not only was missing items but the food sat so long in its own grease that it was practically inedible. 

Best to just go to the Bk when you can.

title: Great App!
review: I love that these coupons are with me on the go. Paper coupons are a hassle, especially having to worry about expiration dates and keeping up with them. This app runs smoothly and helps when I need to locate a BK if I‚Äôm out of town.

title: Getting better!
review: I was able to order more consistently now. Previous versions had many problems using their own coupons. I also can‚Äôt request a cup of ice water yet. But I have my local BK trained that I want ice water, so they just started bringing it without me requesting it. Keep working, guys!

title: Won‚Äôt process my order
review: I‚Äôve tried several times to order through this app and every time I have everything in my cart and go to order something goes wrong. It processes the payment and then says oops, something went wrong, try again later. I‚Äôve tried on different days, different locations. I‚Äôve undownloaded and redownloaded the app. My Apple pay works with almost other app. I‚Äôm not sure what‚Äôs going on. Hopefully it gets fixed soon.

title: Can‚Äôt load the app
review: I‚Äôve tried several times to load the app and offers. I‚Äôve also deleted the app and reloaded it. Tmobile has a deal this week and I can‚Äôt even redeem the offer..

title: Divorce
review: So yesterday me and my kids looked for the finest cuisines on the entire planet, and we found BK. Ever since then, my doctors HATE me now. So I divorced my husband. Buuuuut, I love BK and will always love it I love you I love my mom thanks for reuniting me and my mom back together me and her are having an affair but don‚Äôt worry I love her so much. ThX

title: Good but not great
review: I like that the latest update allows for more customization in the order (ex: extra ketchup, light onion, no mayo etc.) But why can‚Äôt you do the same for ice in drinks, and why are some drinks missing? Since the new update I can‚Äôt select Dr. Pepper, I have to always tell them at the window, change it from coke to DP light ice.

title: Good deals all the time and so easy!
review: My boyfriend and I love a good Whopper when we‚Äôre on the run! This app offers so many great deals and it‚Äôs set up in such a fool proof way. Our doggos get a Whopper party every year for their birthdays so the Jr Whoppers are perfect! You and your entire family will love this app.

title: Okay if you LOVE BK
review: Not a huge Burger King fan, but I went everyday for about a week when they had a $3 10 piece chicken nuggets and large fry deal, but ever since the nuggets were made $1 they took the coupon off, and haven‚Äôt been since. They had awesome coupons, but now they are only useful if you go to Burger King with multiple people, nothing for one person anymore.

title: Improved the app - payments way easier not
review:
This app use to glitch all the time for me and make paying impossible - so much better now. 

Thank you app developers!!!

title: App is 2005 bad
review:
This app is old and runs super bad.  If your store you ordered from is closed with staffing you can only get credit back which is put in the offers section, which means to use it it can be the only offer you use. 

Plus each store doesn‚Äôt honor all the offers so you get ready to submit it tells you this store won‚Äôt honor this deal.  This app has encouraged me to by more McDonald‚Äôs than Burger King.

review:

Once I spent 10min assembling my order, app gave an error saying it couldn‚Äôt connect to the restaurant. Clicking Start Over simply deletes your entire order, which is idiotic to say the least...

title: Be nice if it worked
review: I‚Äôve had no luck getting this to work. 1st attempt got me to check out and then it failed. Today I placed my order and drove over to the restaurant. When I pressed I‚Äôm here an error message popped up about not being able to connect to the restaurant. It suggested I try again later.  NOT!  BK lost my business during a time when they cannot afford to lose any business.  Local pizza shop was happy for my business though!!

title: Better deals than McDonald‚Äôs
review: As McDonald‚Äôs paved the way with mobile apps, Burger King has surpassed them. It‚Äôs all about the deals and the deals at bk draw you to the restaurant whereas McDonald‚Äôs doesn‚Äôt offer much at all, I have deleted the McDonald‚Äôs app and use bk app all the time. So I go to bk all the time

title: Locations closed
review: A lot of the local BKs shown in the app say closed even though they‚Äôre not‚Ä¶ so does that mean a lot of these BKs in my area do not do mobile ordering now because they did before. Pointless to use now especially with offers that are mobile order only.

title: I love the coupons
review: We live and use your coupons all the time, just wish they came every week.  We are in our way to Florida and would use more of the Whopper Jr coupons if they were available.

title: Customize order
review: I like the app yet it has one drawback. I cannot fully customize my order. I would like a text window or a radio button to have my Whopper cut in half or to request that my food is fresh off the broiler or freshly dropped. Outside of this the app is nice. Please consider adding this to your app.

title: Login
review:
Both my husband and I have this app. It USED to be so user friendly, until this most recent update with having the login. 
Why on earth do you need a login on a fast food app?!? When you want to use a coupon it always has be logged out even though I or my husband has logged-in in the past. Which is VERY ANNOYING. Again, WHY... WHY on earth do you NEED a LOGIN on a FAST FOOD APP?!? I guess I don‚Äôt understand.  Please change this!

title: not a native iOS app
review: this is a wrapper built using web components or other 3rd party libraries, it‚Äôs not a native iOS app. The first thing the app does is download an update, which is non standard and breaks ios app guidelines. the entire app is a mess, every tap is a reload of the entire screen and lags like crazy and is highly network dependent. Make a proper app and fire the product managers who built this garbage for low budget.

title: Great App
review: This is BY FAR the best fast food app out there. Along with ease of use, the amount, and quality of the discount codes this app offers is what makes it so much better than others.

title: Doesn‚Äôt pick closest location
review:
When I started my order I selected the closet location to me then when I pulled up it was at a different one 5 miles away. I proceeded to throw my dog out the window and drive off a bridge. Also apparently you can somehow use multiple coupons???? The woman before me did it but my app won‚Äôt let me.
Edit: just got home and that free fry would be nice if they actually put it in my bag.

review:

First I had issues adding multiple offers at once, if you tried to add multiple offers the offers you added before are considered ‚Äúredeemed.‚Äù This would force you to buy using one offer at a time.... my suggestion, get your one good offer at bk and go to McDonald‚Äôs or something after as they have more reliable offers which are easier to redeem

title: Fix bugs

title: Not worth the trouble
review: Downloaded app went to MacDonalds order the one cent Whopper got the confirmation for the coupon was told that I had one hour to redeem app showed the nearest location got tot the store and the app would not load the coupon kept saying that store location was eligible went inside tried to get help was turned away told that I did not have a coupon they f I could give less then one star I would I will never stop at a Burger King again

review:
Two things would make this app better. 

1. Add the ability to pay through Apple Pay
2. Add the ability to store gift cards in the app to use for paying for a mobile order or when in store, or to reload

Apple Pay support was dropped and you now have to enter full billing addresses at checkout, with no support for standard address autocomplete or UIs. iOS also cant autofill any of the fields.

The app also errors out with bizarre messages that make no sense. You then have to start over.

title: Problematic
review:
I love the layout of the app, there are just some big issues.
1st: It‚Äôs rare the app actually works, a lot of the times it gives me an error and I am forced to just order in person. This error isn‚Äôt related to my phone, as this occurs on several other devices. The error tells me that the location isn‚Äôt available for mobile orders at the time. Which is basically every time I use the app.

2nd: The app is sluggish, it needs optimizing. Compared to other mobile apps for ordering fast food, this app has excessive load times. 

Fix those two problems, and you will have a good app.

title: DO NOT USE
review: Tried it twice. First time I chose delivery and it came two hours later very cold and missing items. Second chance I gave it was a pick up order and I arrived at the restaurant only to be told they did not have the order and would not make it despite being shown the receipt. They said I would have to call and request a refund... there is no number. Their system is junk and you will be disappointed.

The UI design is sub-par. It's very standard mobile design. I would expect more from a fast-food giant. Great use photos, but the overall design is just poor and lacking any excitement. It's fine for what it does, but it's bland like the Whopper. 

Maybe I'm being too critical. This app is good as it's food. Bland and boring but has the purpose of serving obese people on the go. 

I personally hate Burger King, but I needed to use it for an order for work.

FIX IT!!!

review: I placed an order on your app due to minimize time being outdoors due to the Covid19. You guy took my 40 bucks and didn‚Äôt give me a refund after cancelling my order. My order was completely cancelled out and now my family is without. I feel robbed and something need to be done! I sent an email just to be told I wouldn‚Äôt hear a response for 48 hours. title: Works for me just fine
review: Not sure why others are having issues with the app. Works flawlessly on my phone

title: The worst app on the market
review: The worst part about this app is how obviously fake the 5 star reviews are. Never have I seen an app made so cheaply. How much could it have possibly cost to give it to a real development team and not some bum with a laptop? The app itself isn‚Äôt even a true app, it literally just converts the Burger King website into a mobile format. Burger King should really be embarrassed for releasing something so unprofessional and so much worse quality than McDonalds.

title: Took my money but did not create my order
review: Used the app to order a burger with coupon. I was given an ‚Äúuh-oh‚Äù message from the app, and didn‚Äôt give me an order number, but still successfully charges my credit card for the purchase. I spent 15 minutes trying to get employees to assist me with the situation, but was simply told that they didn‚Äôt receive my order and proceeded to ignore me as if I was trying to scam them out of a hamburger. Thanks for the embarrassment BK!

title: December Update Fail - Avoid This App
review:
The BK app prior to the most recent update was fast, clean and intuitive.

They need to IMMEDIATELY FIRE whoever did the app redesign. The UI is buggy and poorly designed...abject incompetence.  It went from quick and common sense to some wannabe App Store that takes 10x longer to navigate.

Not only is the design awful the technology is bad too. Slower to load, weird stuttering and an update after the update.

Sheer idiocy. It also appears that they are so desperate to get your fake decoy email address (instead of your order) that you now have to verify your fake email address which is something that I‚Äôll never be bothered to do.

This app encouraged me to eat at BK before, now it‚Äôs just easier to eat somewhere else.

title: Used to be good, but the app always hangs
review: I used to use this regularly about a month ago and it worked great. The app is still ok for using coupons physically in store. The mobile ordering experience ...is a headache. For the past month, each time I try to use mobile checkout the app hangs, says my payment isn‚Äôt valid, or a coupon won‚Äôt apply to the store I‚Äôm at (not necessarily all at once). Please fix this...McDonald‚Äôs never has this issue.

title: Fast food, if you can get it
review: Every time, literally, each and every time I go to use this app I‚Äôm forced to update it first.  The app has been driving me to other fast food chains simply because I want food and I want it fast.  Being forced to update the app makes food faster elsewhere.....  I gave this 1 star because rather than making it easier / better for me it actually slows me down making the overall experience not as good.

Burger King‚Äôs app isn‚Äôt worth losing money and time over.

It was a disgusting experience and will not be using the app nor returning to Burger King, which I was doing this as the first in a long time of not going.

title: Needs to be fixed (was great before when it worked)
review: This app was thee best fast food app out there. But then you changed format and it doesn‚Äôt work now most of the time. Right now it‚Äôs just a blank white page. The app needs to be fixed now. This app was great before, when it worked. 5 star before. Zero stars now that it doesn‚Äôt work. Have to rate 1 star to put this out. (Will change once you fix the app to work again.)

title: App won't let you use t mobile offer
review: T mobile is offering a free Whopper offer. In order to use it you have to click on that offer in the BK app under the trending menu. Normally when you click on anything in the trending menu, there is a pop up or a prompt however the t mobile listing is THE ONLY dead link. Please fix the link so people can use the offer. Deleting and reinstalling the app does nothing to fix it.

title: Updates

I am trying to place an order now immediately after it updated.
I am still having the same problem.

title: App usage

title: Manager Carrie

title: Sometimes buggy

The biggest drawback was being charged for an order that I didn‚Äôt receive.  Luckily, we read our credit card statements and saw that we were charged twice. 

I think this app is destined to be deleted.  Who knows how long it‚Äôs going to take to get the funds credited back to my account.

I was charged now for 2 orders. Called the manager there, nothing they could do because it was ordered on this app. They will not refund a whopping $7.97 !!! Contact Loganathan (mobile guest support). He says I need to contact my credit card company. Come on!!!

title: Scam
review: You load the app once you load it it it takes three times to get into it to the coupon that they‚Äôre making accusations about it then they give you the further is Burger King away from the McDonald‚Äôs making you waste gas etc. this happened at short pump Virginia to me today there is a Burger King right around the corner from the McDonald‚Äôs yet they want to send me all the way to Staples Mill this is not right careful what you look into folks

title: Why change

title: One of the best

title: Burger King customer since mid 1960s
review: The highlight of our week in the mid-1960s was taking our two small children to Muskegon Michigan for a Burger King whopper 120 miles round-trip. We have been a Burger King fan ever since. Thank you for the Burger King app for my phone

title: confusing and misleading
review: i downloaded the app for the new 1 cent whopper promo .. i follows the instructions and used the in-app restaurant locator to begin my mobile order and 3 of the restaurants did not allow the service to work.. come to find out after going to a mcds and then these locations that franchise owners can not participate.  why does the app even include these locations then! frustrating and not worth it. the mcds app is much better and rewarding when it comes to ease of use.

title: Charged me food I never received
review: Used this app in conjunction with T-Mobile Tuesday impossible whopper coupon.  Added fries and soda then app charged my card via app pay. Then app got stuck in a waiting spinner and errors. Huge waste of time and money.

title: Why mobile order when the cashier has to push an order through??

Also it doesn‚Äôt allow for two separate orders on one ticket.

title: Best Deals

title: You had one job
review:
Twice now my order was canceled when I clicked I‚Äôm here. The first time I was given a free burger for my trouble and the second time I was given apologies. No food. They said their system was down as well. They could not sell food. That is the only thing we are really expecting them to do.

The app has never worked for me. I would wait for people to start to report success before going back.

title: Wait time is significantly improved
review: This location has always given good service but today they had my order ready when I pulled up. So nice

title: App does not work
review: In order to use the app, you provide an email that is supposed to send a link that never arrives.  I verified the email was correct and tried three times to no success.

title: Terrible customer support
review: I made an order app stayed on my last location so my order went to a store 1.5 hours away. I called store to cancel order so as they never made order asked employees for a refund they said to call corporate. So I looked on my email receipt where is says need to cancel an order so I called that number they said they would review it. Just received email saying sorry we can‚Äôt help you. No refund.

title: Affordable deals please don‚Äôt stop
review: Unlike McDonald‚Äôs deals in 2019, non of them are really deals. BK is doing great to provide a mobile friendly environment and offers. As a New Yorkers, i highly recommend you to install this app.

title: Let me order it MY WAY with no bun.
review: I love the app. I love that when I order i store I can order a Whopper with cheese ‚Äúlow carb‚Äù and it comes without a bun. Every customization update I‚Äôm hoping that you fix this. Still no. It‚Äôs seriously the only thing missing from the app.

title: Mobile ordering does NOT work.
review:
I have tried multiple times now to make a mobile order with the app and it never works, something is very wrong with this app and needs serious fixing.

McDonalds got this right why can‚Äôt Burger King ?!

title: Love the Woppers
review: I always enjoy eating at Burger King and especially the Whopper sandwich. I just wish the Burger King restaurants in my city had scanners at the register because I have a $10 e-gift card I haven‚Äôt been able to use

title: Burger King
review:
The BK Whopper has always been my favorite fast food burger but I stopped eating them when they discontinued the $1 mini whopper.  

The BK in Lake City MN had some just excellent coffee about ~10 years ago, briefly, when, I think they were doing research on different coffees but since then I‚Äôve had nothing but mediocre coffee at fast food places.

title: Dinner resorted to cold sandwiches!
review: This app is crap. I got a free gift card thought I would use it on the app! NOPE!!! It doesn‚Äôt except it anywhere?!?!?! Also, by time I got the stupid app to take my order. It wants my bank information before I can make sure my order is right. Really annoying. So I canceled the whole thing!  So, now I am wasting more time writing this review instead of getting my family food before work. Thanks for nothing Burger King!

title: Download this.
review: If you don‚Äôt have this already, shame on you. I‚Äôve saved countless dollars on a quick snack using this app. If you‚Äôre hungry, but unfortunately broke, this is perfect for a hot filling meal for less than $5

title: Burger King
review: Wish they would bring back the dollar whopper again plus they need to add grilled onions most of the fast food hamburger apps have it. If it had the dollar whopper it would be a 4 star in my opinion.

title: Awesome Sauce
review: This app is great, it‚Äôs perfect for when I‚Äôm coming home from work and I just want to quick bite I can feed the whole family for under $20! These coupons really are a huge help on a budget!

When it unlocked the offer it should of been a pop up that Properly advise that they don‚Äôt participate. So not happy it was just a waste of time and gas. If you new to the app you have no idea what to expect. Thanks BK for wasting my time. What a joke.

title: Upgrade confusing

title: Stopped giving offers

This app needs serious work to make it a useful app.

review: The only thing I can think of to make the app better, would be to have a lite or no ice option on the drinks.   When I get takeout, I‚Äôm usually going home, and I don‚Äôt like watered down soda pop.

title: An absolutely terrible app to use

review: It would be really nice if you could upgrade drink size to a medium or large or milkshake for an extra option on a meal deal for a small difference.

title: Awful
review: After the new update this app doesn‚Äôt work at all. It says I need to sign up or log in using email and it will send me a link to be able to sign in. I‚Äôve done this about 12 times using different emails. Said it would take up to 3 minutes. Never got a link at all. After contacting support all they said was ‚Äúyou need to log in or sign up using email.‚Äù Yes..I‚Äôm aware of this..but your app WILL NOT LET ME. it‚Äôs ridiculous.

title: Horrible
review:
Have to login every time through email. 

Crashes 

Won‚Äôt let you enter promotion codes because it doesn‚Äôt know you‚Äôre already logged in!

Sure I can save a buck  by spending my own limited time reading emails and tapping buttons that don‚Äôt work but my time is too valuable to waste on this god forsaken app. 

Fix your bugs and stop making us login.  Or how about a Touch ID verification? Anything would be better than this life sucking, never changing, wincing app you are trying to pass off as technology.

If I want to look for coupons I go to McDonald‚Äôs and use their flawless app. BK tech should check it out because they clearly haven‚Äôt seen how a fast food app should work.

title: No friend to seniors
review: Today I downloaded the app and attempted to use it at two BK stores, across town from each other.  Neither of the stores were familiar with the app or able to help me make the the app work.  The shift ‚Äúmanager‚Äù at one of the stores was quite rude and insisted there was no deal as the one I held right in my hand. Senior Citizens often use fast food as a treat, but this demographic would need respect and support, neither on the menu today!

title: App offers not really true
review: Best offers are through the app and mobile orders only. Being that said when you arrive at the restaurant and try to finalize your order through the app, no matter how many payment methods you use it does not accept them. No matter how many times you contact customer service via email or by phone they do nothing for you except give excuses and apologies

title: Buggy
review: You can have a million dollars on a credit card and be rejected repeatedly every other time you want to buy something. They really need to iron this out.

title: Upgraded app works great
review: I previously had significant difficulty getting this app to work. Since the recent upgrade, the app works perfectly. Otherwise, the consistent deals are AMAZING; don‚Äôt order BK without this app

title: Have it your way BK

For 2 days now it keeps saying There seems to be a network connectivity issue, please try again later. I‚Äôve been trying for 2 days! And it‚Äôs not me, it‚Äôs them.

How am I not allowed to view the menu unless I am ordering?? Doesn‚Äôt make sense to me! I do like how I can use the coupons. Only reason it got two stars.

title: Great!

title: Average at best

title: Burger King service
review: Hi the app was very easy and convenient the service was fast and efficient this is a very busy location and have to say the whole staff did excellent

title: Joined for Crypto
review: They require a Robinhood account to redeem. Do not purchase/redeem/trade/hodl crypto in a Robinhood account. They have a laundry list of unethical behavior, most egregiously stopping sales/purchases of various stocks/cryptos when convenient to them. They will close the markets when they deem necessary, and it never cuts in the users favor.

title: Useless app. Too buggy to place order
review: App could not ‚Äúlock on‚Äù to my local restaurant, which I had ordered numerous times before. App was useless to place order at any local BK, couldn‚Äôt load map. Nothing wrong with my Verizon iPhone. The dev team needs to get their Ops working on the backend and squish these bugs. Better yet don‚Äôt introduce blocker bugs like this with new updates.

title: Great Deals

title: Great

title: Debit cards

title: Great app!

title: Locations
